T16n1289u_001:6: pramāṇanirūpaṇapradhānaṃ prakaraṇamārabhamāṇaḥ prathamamāripsitasya prakaraṇasyābhidheyaprayojanaṃ darśayannavatārayati prakaraṇam -- ihetyādinā pramāṇaṃ nirṇetavyamityantena |
T16n1289u_001:7: svarūpato lakṣaṇataḥ phalaśca pramāṇanirṇayaḥ prakaraṇasyāsya sākṣātprayojanamiti gamyate |
T16n1289u_001:11: pramāṇapathaṃ nirṇīya pravarttamānānāṃ puruṣārthasiddhiriti paramaṃ prayojanaṃ 'sarvapuruṣārthasiddhinimittaṃ pramāṇamanusaradbhi' rityanena
T16n1289u_001:16: prekṣāpūrvakāriṇo'pi ye punaraptakāmā akāmā vā na teṣāṃ pramāṇāpekṣā |
T16n1289u_001:17: ye tu prekṣāparāyaṇā arthinaste puruṣārthasiddhaye pramāṇamanusareyureva |
T16n1289u_001:21: athāpi prameyasiddhiḥ pramāṇādhīneti prameyanirṇayataḥ prāk pramāṇasvarūpaṃ nirṇetavyam,
T16n1289u_001:23: etena prameyasvarūpanirūpaṇaparānnibandhāt pramāṇasvarūpanirūpaṇaparasyāsya nibandhasya prādhānyaṃ gamyate |
T16n1289u_001:31: saṃśayaviparyayayoravisaṃvādakatā nāstītyetadupapādayannavisaṃvādakatvaṃ vyācaṣṭe -- gocare tu tatsthāne ghaṭādau satīti |
T16n1289u_001:34: jalādipratyakṣaṃ jalāya pravarttayat puruṣaṃ jalaṃ prāpayati |
T16n1289u_001:35: marīcikājalaṃbhramastu jalāya pravarttayat puruṣaṃ jalaṃ na prāpayati |
T16n1289u_001:42: devadatto yajñadattaṃ karmasu pravarttayan dhanaṃ prāpayati |
T16n1289u_001:52: yena nirṇayena pravṛttaḥ puruṣo'sati pratibandhe pradarśitamarthaṃ prāpnuyādeveti |
T16n1289u_001:54: na hi puruṣa iva haṭhāt pravartayituṃ śaknoti vijñānam ' iti,
T16n1289u_001:56: āha ca kamalaśīlaḥ -- avisaṃvāditvaṃ cārthakriyāsamarthāryaprāpaṇaśaktikatvaṃ na tvaryaprāpaṇameva' iti ( tattvasaṃgrahapañjikā pa. 312).
T16n1289u_001:60: āha ca kamalaśīlastatvasaṃgrahapañcikāyām ' pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamapi sajātīyavijātīyavyāvṛttamanalādikamarthaṃ tadākāranirbhāsotpattitaḥ paricchindadutpadyate tacca niyatarūpavastugrāhitvādvijātīyavyāvṛttavastvākārānugatattvācca tatraiva vastuni vidhipratiṣedhāvāvirbhāvayati ' analo'yaṃ nāsau kusumastabakādiriti' iti ( tattva. pa. pa. 390)
T16n1289u_001:61: āha ca tatraivānupadam -- ' jñānaṃ hi viṣayākāramutpadyamānaṃ viṣayaṃ paricchindadiva savyāpāramiva bhavati' ayamevārthaprāpaṇavyāpāro jñānasyeti
T16n1289u_001:64: na cārthadeśaṃ puruṣamupasarpayadarthaṃ vā puruṣadeśamānayat prāpakaṃ bhavati,
T16n1289u_001:66: taṃ ca puruṣaṃ na hastena gṛhītvā pravarttayati, kiṃ tarhi ?
T16n1289u_001:72: kvacitpravṛttyabhāvaḥ kvacitpravṛttāvapyarthālābhaḥ svasvasāmagryabhāvaprayukta iti pramāṇasya prāmāṇyamakṣatamevetyetadupapādayati -- puruṣastviti
T16n1289u_001:75: pravṛttāvapi tadalābhaḥ pratibandhāditi phalaphalibhāve bhedādalābhādapravṛttervā pramāṇasya prāmāṇyaṃ na pratirudhyata iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:80: ayamāśayaḥ-purataḥ sannihitamavalokayataḥ sapadi bhavati pratyakṣaṃ nāmajātyādikalpanārahitaṃ nirvikalpakamanirdhāraṇātmakam,
T16n1289u_001:82: tat jātamātre pratyekṣe yatprāmāṇyasmavisaṃvādakatvamarthaprāpaṇayogyatvaṃ tadarthakriyāprāptimantareṇa na vijñāyate,
T16n1289u_001:90: iyāṃstu viśeṣaḥ-yo mandabuddhiḥ jātamātre jalapratyakṣe na tasya prāmāṇyamavadhārayituṃ śaknoti;
T16n1289u_001:93: amandabuddhistu prakāśavaśadyena idamidameveti sapadyavadhārayati avadharayati ca sapadi prāmāṇyamiti |
T16n1289u_001:96: śrāvaṇe tu pratyakṣe na tad ghaṭate,
T16n1289u_001:98: yadā kaścit kasmaicit kimapyupadiśati tadā tadvacanamavadhāryate kevalam,
T16n1289u_001:103: na tatra jalādiṣu dṛṣṭeṣu snānapānādikriyeva kā'pyarthakriyāsthitiḥ,
T16n1289u_001:106: tat cākṣuṣajñānasyeva śrāvaṇajñānasyāpi avabhāsyārthāvadhāraṇalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ samānameveti |
T16n1289u_001:107: 'jñānānaṃ prāmāṇyāṃ svata eva gṛhyate' iti mīmāṃsakamataṃ nirasyannāha-ata eveti |
T16n1289u_001:109: amandabuddhestu jātamātre pratyakṣe nirdhāritaviśeṣasya prathamata eva prāmāṇyagrahaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:116: yogabalājjāyamānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ hi viśadāvabhāsarūpameveti tasya prāmāṇyaṃ svata eva gṛhyate |
T16n1289u_001:119: na hi sukhe sākṣātkriyamāṇe tasmin saṃśayaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:122: etena jñānasya prāmāṇyaṃ svata eva gamyatta iti niyamo nāsmākamityuktaṃ bhavati |
T16n1289u_001:128: taiḥ kiñcit svataḥ pramāṇamiṣṭam yathā-svasaṃvedanaṃ yogijñānam arthakriyājñānam anumānam abhyāsavacca pratyakṣam |
T16n1289u_001:137: arthapradarśakatā ca yadyapi prathamotpannajñānasyeva dhārāvāhini dvitīyādijñāne'pyaviśiṣṭā,
T16n1289u_001:139: ato dvitīyādijñānamanapekṣyaiva tata evaṃ pravarttate puruṣa iti dvitīyādijñānamanyathāsiddhaṃ pravṛttāvanaṅgamiti na tasya prāmāṇyam |
T16n1289u_001:142: yenaiva hi jñānena prathamamadhigato'rthastenaiva pravarttitaḥ puruṣaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:145: (nyā. bi. pa.4) vyākhyātaṃ caitadanyatrāsmābhiḥ-arthakriyāsu pravarttamānā anavagatatattatsamarthārthāstadarthāvagataye tadarthāvabhāsakaṃ pramāṇaṃ
T16n1289u_001:148: atha yattathāvidhamarthamavabhāsathadapanīya tadajñānamupakaroti tasmai puṃse tat taṃ pramātāramapekṣya tasminnarthe pramāṇam yattu na kiñcidapyupakaroti na tadarthāvabhāsakamapi pramāṇavyavahārapadamadhigacchati |
T16n1289u_001:150: pramāṇādarthāvadhāraṇāt pūrvaṃ yā tadarthānavagatirajñānalakṣaṇā sā hi vināśyate prathamena pramāṇena tadarthāvadhāraṇalakṣaṇena |
T16n1289u_001:156: tatsādhāraṇaṃ tu pramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamityāśaṅkāṃ nirasyannāha-samyak jñānaṃ pramāṇamityukta iti |
T16n1289u_001:163: atastasya pramāṇakoṭāvanantarbhāvānna tatsādhāraṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kāryamiti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:164: nanvevaṃ sati sākṣātkāra eva pramāṇamityuktaṃ bhavati,
T16n1289u_001:166: idaṃ pramākaraṇaṃ yatpramāṇamucyate ityayaṃ phalaphalivibhāgo nopapadyeteti ced anupadaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇanirūpaṇāvasare vakṣyāmaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:175: nanu rūpadijñāne akṣāṇāmivārthānāmapi hetutvamastīti arthāśritatvamabhipretya pratyarthamiti kutona vyapadeśaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:178: akṣeṇa tvasādhāraṇaḥ irti pratyakṣaśabdenaiva vyapadeśo yujyate |
T16n1289u_001:187: asādhāraṇācca vyavahāro dṛśyate yathā yavaśabdo yavāṅkure' iti |
T16n1289u_001:192: ayaṃ bhavaḥ- akṣāśritatvaṃ pratyakṣaśabdasya vyutpattau nimittaṃ na tu pravṛttinimittaṃ,
T16n1289u_001:195: tena ca vyutpattinimittena ekārthasamavetaṃ pravṛttinimittaṃ sākṣātkāritvamupalakṣyate |
T16n1289u_001:196: yathā paṅkajaśabdavyutpattinimittena paṅkajanikarttṛtvena tadekārthasamavetaṃ padmatvaṃ tathā |
T16n1289u_001:197: uktaṃ ca dharmottarācāryaṇa - ' āśritatvaṃ ca vyutpattinimittaṃ śabdasya,
T16n1289u_001:201: tataśca yadeva yatkiñcidarthasya sākṣātkārijñānaṃ tatpratyakṣamucyate' iti |
T16n1289u_001:205: sāmānye vyutpanno'yaṃ śabdo rūḍhyā viśeṣaṃ bodhayatītyetat |
T16n1289u_001:211: ayamāśayaḥ-parasyāpratipattiṃ vipratipattiṃ vā nivārayan yathāsvasamayaṃ tattallakṣaṇaṃ praṇayannayaṃ parasyāpratipattivipratipattī kathamavagacchati?
T16n1289u_001:214: tathā paraṃ svābhiprāyaṃ jñāpayannayaṃ vākyaṃ yadā prayuṅkte tadā prayujyamānavākyasya vivakṣāyāṃ liṅgatvamajānatā'pyabhyupagatameveti |
T16n1289u_001:221: śābdaṃ jñānaṃ pramāṇamiti vadatā bāhyārthāvisaṃvāditvena prāmāṇyamaṅgīkarttavyam,
T16n1289u_001:223: arthaviśeṣaparicchittau śabdaviśeṣasya hetutvaṃ ca tayoḥ śabdārthayoḥ sambandhamantareṇa na saṃbhavati,
T16n1289u_001:225: unmīlitamātre cakṣuṣi nīlādiparicchittivat śrutamātre śabdaviśeṣe'rthaparicchittiḥ sarveṣāmeva (avyutpannānāmapi) syāt |
T16n1289u_001:226: ataḥ sambandhaḥ śabdārthayorvācyaḥ sa ka iti vikalpya dūṣayati-śabdārthayoḥ sambandho bhavannityādinā |
T16n1289u_001:239: śabdaṃ prati vā'ryasya hetutve sati tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ sambandho ghaṭeta,
T16n1289u_001:243: pradīpaghaṭayoḥ prakāśyaprakāśakabhāvasya naisargikatayā pradīpaḥ sattāmātreṇa yathā prakāśayatyarthaṃ tathā śabdārthayoḥ vācyavācakabhāvākhye sambandhe naisargike sati śrutamātraḥ śabdo'viśeṣeṇāsaṅketajñānapi bodhayedarthamityāha-evaṃ tarhīti |
T16n1289u_001:244: laukiko'pi puruṣo'rthaviśeṣaśabdaviśeṣayoḥ saṅketānabhijñaḥ kaḥ syādityatra puruṣaviśeṣaṃ nidarśayannāha - abhinaveti |
T16n1289u_001:245: yatra dvīpe'gniśabdasya vyavahāra eva na tato dvīpādāgata iti yāvat |
T16n1289u_001:246: nanu yadyapi śabdārthayorasti vācyavācakabhāvo naisargikaḥ sambandhaḥ;
T16n1289u_001:253: evaṃ satyasya prāmāṇyaṃ na hyavatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:255: āha ca kamalaśīla - ' na hi prakṛtyā'rthapratītihetavo dīpādayaḥ saṅketamapekṣante,
T16n1289u_001:256: anyathā saṅketasyaivānvayavyatirekābhyāmarthapratītau sāmarthyaṃ syāt na svābhāvikasya sambandhasya' iti (tattvasaṃ. pa. 438). ata iti |
T16n1289u_001:260: sambandhe sati hyanena śabdenāyamevārtho bodhya iti nirṇayaḥ syāt |
T16n1289u_001:261: sambandhābhāvādaviśeṣādvivakṣitārtha evānena śabdena bodhyeteti nirṇayo naiva bhavediti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:262: anupapadyamānamapi sambandhaṃ tuṣyatviti nyāyenābhyupagamyāpi dūṣayati-astu veti |
T16n1289u_001:264: niyate vastunaḥ svabhāve nākṣepāvasara ityabhiprāyeṇa śaṅkate-atha vaktavyamiti |
T16n1289u_001:269: gnirutpadyamāno nisargata eva dāhakaśaktiviśiṣṭa evotpadyate tathā śabdaviśeṣo'rthaviśeṣapratyāyakaśaktiviśiṣṭa evotpadyate ityabhiprāyeṇa pareṇa kriyamāṇāṃ śaṅkāmanūdya pratikṣipati-nacaivaṃ vaktavyamityādinā |
T16n1289u_001:273: yacca parairāptoccāritaṃ vākyaṃ pramāṇamityucyate tad dūṣayati-nāpyāptapraṇītaśabdānāmiti |
T16n1289u_001:274: anāptānuccāritaṃ vākyaṃ pramāṇamiti vadatāṃ vedasyāpauruṣeyatvena svataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ varṇayatāṃ mīmāṃsakānāṃ pakṣaṃ dūṣayati-sambandhadūṣaṇenaivati
T16n1289u_001:277: prayokturarthavivakṣāyā vaco liṅgatayā jñāpakaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:283: sā vivakṣā taddhetuḥ tasya prayujyamānasya vacaso hetuḥ,
T16n1289u_001:295: asati tasmin kathaṃ jñānasya prāmāṇyamiti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:299: atideśavākyaṃ śrutvā vanaṃ gataḥ piṇḍaviśeṣaṃ yadā paśyati tadā'sya piṇḍāparokṣamātram |
T16n1289u_001:302: nanu piṇḍadarśanasamanantaramayaṃ gavayapadavācya iti bhavati samākhyāsaṃbandhagrahaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:304: ato'sti viṣayo yaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sambandhaḥ samākhyeti |
T16n1289u_001:311: imau sambhandhinau anayoścāyaṃ sambhandha iti vadatā vaktavyaṃ kimasau sambhandho dṛśya utādhṛśyaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:314: sambhandhī yadā dṛśyate tadā dṛśyeta so'pi,
T16n1289u_001:316: tasmāt sambhandho na pāramārthika iti śabdārthayoḥ samākhyā sambandhastatprakāśakatayopamāyāḥ prāmāṇyamityetannaiva ghaṭata itibhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:319: yatra tu bhinnā tatra na tadaiva tadupalabhyeta,
T16n1289u_001:325: na hi ghaṭapaṭayoḥ sattāmātraṃ ghaṭapaṭau saṃyuktāviti buddhau hetuḥ,
T16n1289u_001:327: ataḥ saṃyogo nāma tābhyāmanyo vaiśiṣṭyapratītiniyāmakaḥ svīkāryaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:333: ayamāśayaḥ- sarveṣāmeva satāṃ kṣaṇikatvena saṃyuktapratītigocararyoviśliṣtapratītigocarābhyāṃ bhinnatvena tayoreva ca sambaddhapratyayahetutvena tābhyamatiriktasya sambaddasyānapekṣaṇād viśiṣṭabuddhiḥ sambandhamatiriktaṃ kalpayituṃ na prabhavatīti |
T16n1289u_001:334: idamatra bodhyam -- yo gosadṛśaḥ sa gavaya iti tu śvāvaṇaṃ pratyakṣaṃ |
T16n1289u_001:336: pīṇḍaviśeṣadarśanaṃ tu tadanantarabhāvi piṇḍaviśeṣaprakāśakatayā tanmātre pramāṇam |
T16n1289u_001:339: dṛṣṭe piṇḍaviśeṣe tataḥ paścād yaśca samākhyāsambandhagrahaḥ so'pi gavayasāmānye bauddha eva vastunīti smṛtito na bahirbhavati |
T16n1289u_001:340: api ca samākhyāsambandhagrahopāyāścānye'pi santi yathā--kaṃ pika iti pṛṣṭe kaścidāha,
T16n1289u_001:341: yo madhuraṃ rauti sa pika iti,
T16n1289u_001:365: sādṛṣyaviśiṣṭaḥ piṇḍaḥ piṇḍaviśiṣṭaṃ vā sādṛṣyamupamānaviṣayastena varṇyate iti |
T16n1289u_001:366: ayamāśayaḥ- pūrvaṃ grāme gāṃ dṛṣṭvā paścāt jātu vanaṃ gato gavayaṃ paśyati,
T16n1289u_001:367: tadā tasya bhavati sapadi piṇḍaviśeṣapratyakṣamālocanātmakaṃ jñānaṃ,
T16n1289u_001:368: tataśca gosadṛśo'yaṃ paśuriti viśeṣato viniścayaḥ savikalpakaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:370: tataśca bhavati ' anena paśunā sadṛśo gau' riti jñānam |
T16n1289u_001:372: asya ca viṣayo gavayasādṛśyaviśiṣṭo gauḥ goniṣṭhaṃ vā sādṛśyam |
T16n1289u_001:379: tasmād yat smaryate tat syāt sādṛśyena viśeṣitam |
T16n1289u_001:381: pratyakṣeṇāvaruddhe ca sādṛśye ca gavi smṛte |
T16n1289u_001:392: tad dṛṣṭābhyāṃ piṇḍābhyāmamanyat sādṛśyaṃ nāma na pramāṇagocaramiti yāvat |
T16n1289u_001:397: ayamāśayaḥ-nanvayamanena sadṛśa iti yeyaṃ pratītiḥ saiva sādṛśye liṅgam,
T16n1289u_001:401: tau svahetorutpannau tāvevāyamanena sadṛśāviti pratyaye hetū,
T16n1289u_001:402: iti na tato'tiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vastu siddhyati |
T16n1289u_001:406: svayameva pramāṇāntarasiddhayoḥ sādṛśyapiṇḍayorviśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāvamātrasyopamānapramāṇaviṣayatāṃ bruvan sādṛśyaṃ kena pramāṇena siddhyatīti puṣṭe anenaivopamānapramāṇeneti kathaṃ bruyāt,
T16n1289u_001:408: idamatra bodhyam-gosadṛśe gavaye dṛṣṭe anubhūtapūrve gavi etatsadṛśo gauritivat etadvisadṛśasturaga iti bhavatyanubhūtapūrve turage,
T16n1289u_001:409: tadasyā vaisādṛśyapratīterapi pramānāntaratā kiṃ na syāt |
T16n1289u_001:412: evaṃ taruśreṇyāṃ dṛśyamānāyāṃ prathamatarudarśane'nadhigatamādyatvaṃ dvitīyatarudarśanāntaraṃ dṛṣṭapūrve tarāvādyatvamadhigamyate 'sa tarurādya' iti |
T16n1289u_001:416: tadvaisādṛśyavijñānaṃ yat tadanyā pramā na kim |
T16n1289u_001:426: yadi prāmāṇyaṃ tadā'numāna evāntarbhāva iti yāvat |
T16n1289u_001:429: pramāṇadṛṣṭo'rthaḥ- divā'bhuñjānasya pīnatvaṃ jīvato gṛhe'bhāva ityādiḥ |
T16n1289u_001:434: asati ca tasya tasminnarthe prāmāṇyameva na |
T16n1289u_001:435: yathā divā'bhuñjānasya yat pīnatvaṃ tasya ca rātribhojanasya ca kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ prabibandho'stīti rātribhojane kāraṇe pīnatvaṃ kāryaṃ liṅgaṃ bhavitumarhatītyanumānānna pṛthagarthāpattestatra prāmāṇyam |
T16n1289u_001:436: yattu mīmāṃsakaḥ prāha - divā'bhuñjānasya pīnatvaśravaṇād rātrau bhuṅkte iti vākyaṃ parikalpyate iti |
T16n1289u_001:437: tadetadasambandhānnopapadyate iti na tatra pramaṇaṃ kimapi |
T16n1289u_001:442: niścitaṃ tena sambandhād vastuno vastuto gatiḥ ||
T16n1289u_001:452: āha ca śabarasvāmī - 'abhāvo'pi pramāṇābhāvaḥ nāstītyarthasyāsannikṛṣṭasya' iti |
T16n1289u_001:456: iti | abhāvapramāṇatayābhimatāṃ pramāṇapañcakānutpattiṃ vikalpya dūṣayati - tatra keyamityādinā |
T16n1289u_001:482: pratyakṣādyanutpattirityatra kiṃ jñānamātraṃ vivakṣitamuta jñānaviśeṣa iti vikalpamabhipretya jñānasāmānyapakṣaṃ nirasyati-deśakāletyādinā |
T16n1289u_001:487: ekasmin jñāne ghaṭaviśiṣtapratyakṣe yadviṣayatayā sambaddhaṃ bhūtalaṃ-bhūtalamātraṃ tasya vastunaḥ pratyakṣameva pratyakṣādyanutpattirityanenocyate iti yāvat |
T16n1289u_001:489: yatpradeśaviṣayakaṃ viśiṣṭapratyakṣaṃ tatpradeśaviśeṣaviṣayakameva bhūtalamātrapratyakṣamapīti tadidaṃ pratyakṣamabhāvapramāṇamucyate iti bhāvaḥ
T16n1289u_001:504: yadṛcchāśabdeṣu nāmnā ḍittha iti jātiśabdeṣu tathā gauriti ' tyādinā (pramāṇa. 12) |
T16n1289u_001:508: abhilāpasaṃsargayogyaḥ pratibhāso yasyāṃ pratītau sā abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsā |
T16n1289u_001:509: yogyatvaniveśād bālamūkādīnāṃ yā kalpanā'ntarjalpākārā tasyāḥ saṃgrahaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:511: abhilāpena saṃsarga ekasmin jñāne abhidheyākārasyābhidhānākāreṇa saha grāhyākāratayā śīlanam,
T16n1289u_001:512: tato yadekasmin jñāne yadabhidheyābhidhākārau saṃniviṣṭau bhavataḥ tadā saṃsṛṣṭe'bhidhānābhidheye bhavataḥ |
T16n1289u_001:513: abhilāpasaṃsargāya yogyo'bhidheyāvabhāso yasyāṃ pratītau sā tathokte ' ti |
T16n1289u_001:524: tathā caladvṛkṣadarśanena pītaśaṅkhadarśanena vā bhrameṇa pravṛttasyāpyarthaprāptirdṛṣṭā,
T16n1289u_001:525: tattayoḥ prāmāṇyaṃ neti kathamavadhāritamityāśayena śaṅkate - kiṃ punariti |
T16n1289u_001:532: kalpanājñānasya bhramasya ca tathātvaṃ netyāha -- nacetyādinā |
T16n1289u_001:533: arthaṃ sākṣātkartuṃ yat kṣamate jñānaṃ tadarthasākṣātkārīti yuktam ,
T16n1289u_001:535: kalpanājñānasya bhramasya ca na tatkṣamatetyāha -- naca kalpanāvibhramāviti |
T16n1289u_001:541: yasmād grāhyaṃ vastu jñāne svākārārpaṇakṣamaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:543: yadidaṃ nāmajātyādikalpanāyuktaṃ jñānaṃ tad vinaiva nīlādisvalakṣaṇamarthaṃ vāsanāmātreṇa jāyate iti na tasyārthakāryatā,
T16n1289u_001:544: yasmānnārthakāryaṃ tat tasmānnārthagrāhitā tasyeti kathaṃ tadarthasākṣātkāri bhavitumarhatīti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:546: nāmajātyādyabhilāpinī kalpanāpratītirnīlādiśabdaṃ śṛṇvato'ndhasyāpi bhavatyeveti kalpanāyā apyarthajanyatvābhyupaṃgame tasyāpi rūpadarśitvamāpatet
T16n1289u_001:552: tathāhīti | ayamāśayaḥ--puraḥsthitaṃ paśyataḥ puruṣasya bhavatu nāmāyaṃ ghaṭa iti nāmānuviddhapratyayaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:553: tenaivaṃ yadā ghaṭo'nubhūyate tadā''śrayībhūtaṃ bhūtalaṃ nayanagocarībhūtamanubhūyata eva,
T16n1289u_001:555: tannopapadyate sarvaṃ eva pratyayo nāmānuviddha iti |
T16n1289u_001:558: unmīlitamātre nayate puraḥsthitaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ vastu sākṣātkriyata eva,
T16n1289u_001:560: sa ca nimīlya nayane vicārayato'pi bhavatyeva,
T16n1289u_001:563: arthakriyākṣame vastuni yadviparyastamutpadyate tadeva bhrāntamucyate bhrāntisvarūpavidbhirityarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:564: viparyastāvabhāsakasya jñānasya yathāvasthita-vastugrāhakatvābhāvena na pratyakṣatvamiti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:571: ayamāśayaḥ -- yadi gacchadvṛkṣapītaśaṅkhādidarśanaṃ bhrāntamiti na tat pratyakṣaṃ,
T16n1289u_001:575: caladvṛkṣadarśanena pravṛtto vṛkṣaṃ tadvaddeśaṃ vā prāpnoti |
T16n1289u_001:584: tataḥ-caladvṛkṣādi-darśanād avabhāsitasya vastuno na prāptiḥ kiṃtarhi,
T16n1289u_001:592: na prāpyate hi tena yathāvabhāsaṃ vastu,
T16n1289u_001:608: bhāsamānasya varṇasya na ca saṃvāda iṣyate' |
T16n1289u_001:611: āha ca kamalaśīlaḥ- 'pramāṇaṃ bhavad dvābhyāmākārābhyāṃ bhavati |
T16n1289u_001:620: āha ca dharmottarācāryaḥ - 'yadi mithyājñānaṃ kathaṃ tato vṛkṣāvāptiricet,
T16n1289u_001:625: yaddeśascāvāpyate sa na dṛṣṭa iti' iti |
T16n1289u_001:627: idamabhihitaṃ bhavati -- avabhāsyamānaścaladvṛkṣādirarthakriyāsamarthājjñānāntarāvabhāsyānniyatadeśavṛkṣādanya evetyarthakriyāsamarthārthāvabhāsakatvasya tathāvidhādhyavasāyahetutvasya vā'bhāvena na caladvṛkṣādidarśanasya prāmāṇyam,
T16n1289u_001:630: anumānasya sāmānyameva viṣaya iti na tatkalpanāpoḍham |
T16n1289u_001:631: nanu--kalpanāpoḍhameva cet pratyakṣapramāṇaṃ tasya kathaṃ vyavahārāṅgatā |
T16n1289u_001:632: na hyanirdeśyamavabhāsayat pravṛttaye nivṛttaye vā prabhavati |
T16n1289u_001:634: kalpanāvirahitamanirdeśyamavabhāsayadapi pravṛttyādhāyakasya gaurayamityasya savikalpakasyotpādakatayā bhavati vyavahārāṅgam |
T16n1289u_001:651: uktaṃ ca kamalaśīlena-'pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamapi sajātīyavijātīyavyāvṛttamanalādikamarthaṃ tadākāranirbhāsotpattitaḥ parichindadurpadyate
T16n1289u_001:652: tacca niyatarūpavyavasthitavastugrāhitvād vijātīyavyāvṛttavastvākārānugatatvācca tatraiva vastuni vidhipratiṣedhāvāvirbhāvayati--analo'yaṃ nāsau kusumastabaka iti,
T16n1289u_001:653: tayo śca vikalpayoḥ pāramparyeṇa vastuni pratibandhādavisaṃvāditve'pi na prāmāṇyamiṣṭam |
T16n1289u_001:659: uktaṃ ca pārśvadevena -- 'prāpaṇīyaśca pratyakṣasya santāna eveati (nyāyapraveśavṛttipañcikā 77)
T16n1289u_001:665: rūpādipratyakṣe vaṣasyāpi hetutayā viṣayāśrayamityapi vaktuṃ śakyetetyetāṃ śaṅkāṃ pariharannāha-indriyapratyakṣamiti vyapadeśasyeti |
T16n1289u_001:666: uktaṃ ca - 'asādhāraṇahetutvādakṣaistad vyapadiśyate' ti kalpanāpoḍhasyāsya cākṣuṣādervikalpotpādanadvāreṇaiva svāvabhāsite'rthe pramāṇatā,
T16n1289u_001:670: vyapetasakalavāsanasya saṃbhavatyapi nirvikalpake pratyakṣe savikalpānutpādena na tamapekṣya pramāṇam |
T16n1289u_001:679: tadviṣayasantānavartī tadanantarasamutpanno ghaṭādidvitīyakṣaṇaścetyubhayaṃ militvā mānasaṃ pratyakṣaṃ janayatīti yāvat |
T16n1289u_001:682: uktaṃca-'hetuḥ pratyayo nimittaṃ karaṇaxxmiti paryāyāḥ' iti |
T16n1289u_001:686: uttaravijñāne hetubhūtasyaikasantānavartino jñānasya samanantara pratyaya ityeṣā saṃjñā |
T16n1289u_001:688: uparate cakṣurvyāpāre anukṣaṇaṃ yadvijñānaṃ tena cakṣurvijñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakṛtenotpādyate,
T16n1289u_001:691: asyoktalakṣaṇalakṣitasya mānasapratyakṣasya vyahārapathāgocaratvamityeṣa doṣo na bhavati |
T16n1289u_001:699: nanu āgame vyavāhāre sarvathānupayuktasyāsyābhyupagamo nirarthaka ityāśayenāśaṅkate--nanviti |
T16n1289u_001:701: ayamāśayaḥ -- nahi lokavyavahāre'nupayuktatāmātreṇa vastu apahnotuṃ śakyate |
T16n1289u_001:704: uktena ca lakṣaṇena tat pratyakṣaṃ vivecitaṃ bhavati |
T16n1289u_001:705: tadanena vivecanena āgame pareṣāmaviśuddhyāśaṅkāpi nirastā bhavatīti |
T16n1289u_001:708: evaṃjātīyakaṃ yadi syāt na kaścit doṣaḥ syāditi vaktuṃ lakṣaṇamākhyātamasyetī'ti |
T16n1289u_001:715: anya eva nīlādibhyo bāhyebhyaḥ sātādaya ābhyantarāḥ,
T16n1289u_001:716: dṛśyamānasya nīlādervastuno viśeṣāvasthāgrāhakā jñānaprabhedāḥ sukhaduḥkhopekṣālakṣaṇā nīlādivastuṣu sākṣātkriyamāṇeṣu jāyante,
T16n1289u_001:717: tānyetāni yena rūpeṇa saṃvedyante tat svasaṃvedanapratyakṣamucyate |
T16n1289u_001:719: idamabhihitaṃ bhavati--nīlādibāhyavastusākṣātkārasamaye sa sākṣātkāro nānavabhāsamānastiṣṭhati nīlādivat,
T16n1289u_001:721: tadeṣāmavabhāsaḥ svenaivotpanna iti svasaṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣamucyate iti |
T16n1289u_001:726: icchākrodhamohasukhaduḥkhādikaṃ hi indriyamanapekṣya bhavatīti svasaṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣamiti |
T16n1289u_001:728: nanu svasaṃvedanamityanena svenaiva svayaṃ saṃvedyata ityuktaṃ bhavati nacaikasyāmeva kriyāyāmekasyaiva kartṛtvaṃ karmatvaṃ copapadyate ityāśayena śaṅkate -- atra kecidāhuriti |
T16n1289u_001:732: sarvameva vastu hetubalādutpadyamānaṃ bhinnabhinnasvabhāvamutpadyate iti vastūnāṃ svabhāvaviśeṣe vyavasthāpakastattaddhetureva,
T16n1289u_001:737: jñānasya jñānāntara prakāśyatve kiṃ samakālavartinā jñānāntareṇa prakāśyate uta bhinnakālavartineti vikalpya kramād dūṣayati--na tāvaditi |
T16n1289u_001:740: na hi vāmadakṣiṇaviṣāṇayormitha upakāryopakārakabhāva iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:742: jñānaṃ svānantarotpannena jñānāntareṇa ahamidaṃ jānāmītyanuvyavasāyātmakenāvabhāsyate ityetannopapadyate |
T16n1289u_001:743: vastumātrasya kṣaṇikatvena dvitīyakṣaṇe tasya vināśāt kva prakāśāvasaraḥ,
T16n1289u_001:748: kṣaṇikasyāsya jñānasya jñānāntarasaṃvedyatvāsaṃbhavāt svasaṃvedyatvasya cānabhyupagame ghaṭādivat parokṣatvāt ghaṭādibāhyārthasadharmatayā jñānamiti ko'yamarthavilakṣaṇo vyapadeśaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:749: parokṣasyāsya prakāśakaṃ na kimapīti tatsvarūpaṃ kena vā lakṣyetetyarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:757: tasmādasaṃviditasyāpi jñānasya jñāto'rtha ityarthaviśeṣaṇatayā'vabhāso yujyata ityāśayena śaṅkate -- yaccoktamiti |
T16n1289u_001:760: idaṃ ca vijñānasya svasaṃvedyatvamantarā nopapadyate iti naḥ pakṣa eva siddhyatītyāśayena pratividhatte -- tadasādhviti |
T16n1289u_001:765: asya jñānasya yeyamajaḍarūpatā saivāsya jñānasya ātmasaṃvittiḥ svasaṃvedyatetyarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:770: nanu dīpasya paraprakāśakasya svaprakāśasvabhāvatevāstu nīlādibāhyārthaprakāśakasya jñānasya svaprakāśatā,
T16n1289u_001:777: nanu mānasenānyena jñāneneticet jñānānāṃ kramikatvaniyamo'bhyupagato vihanyeta |
T16n1289u_001:790: sukhādi vedyate kasmāt tasmin kāle nirantaram | (tattvasaṃ. 396)
T16n1289u_001:808: tāmavasthāṃ nidarśanena pradarśayati dharmottarācāryaḥ--'abhrakavya--vahitamiva yadā bhāvyamānaṃ vastu paśyati sā prakarṣaparyantajāvastheti
T16n1289u_001:810: tasmāt prakarṣaparyantājjātaṃ yat jñānaṃ bhūtārthasphuṭāvabhāsātmakaṃ karatalāmalakāvabhāsavadbhavati tadidaṃ yogipratyakṣamiti yāvat |
T16n1289u_001:815: 'yathā cittaṃ nirvikalpakaṃ tathā yogināṃ jñānamapi bhavati |
T16n1289u_001:816: yogaḥ samādhiḥ sa yasyāsti sa yogī |
T16n1289u_001:827: tatra duḥkhaṃ yadidaṃ bhūtacatuṣṭayaṃ ye ceme viṣayā rūpādayaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:832: yaścāsya duḥkhasya nirodho nirvāṇakakṣaṇaḥ sa nirodha ucyate |
T16n1289u_001:833: yo nirodhasya dvāraṃ samyag jñānādiḥ sa mārga ucyate |
T16n1289u_001:835: rūpaskandho vedanāskandhaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandho vijñānaskandha iti pañcaskandhāḥ |
T16n1289u_001:839: seyaṃ dīpajvāleti pratyabhijñānamivedamapi pratyabhijñānamanumānapramāṇabādhitatayā bhramarūpamiti yāvat |
T16n1289u_001:843: lakṣaṇaṃ--lakṣyate vastu yena rūpeṇa tallakṣaṇaṃ--vastuno rūpam |
T16n1289u_001:847: yatsāmānyaṃ paraiḥ pratyakṣasya viṣaya iṣyate tattu aniyatadeśakālākāram,
T16n1289u_001:854: tatra pratyakṣaṃ deśakālākāraniyatena ghaṭādisvalakṣaṇākāreṇaivotpadyate iti pratyakṣasya gocaraḥ svalakṣaṇamucyate |
T16n1289u_001:859: dravyādiṣu ṣat su dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma ceti trayāṇāṃ sattājātiyogenaikarāśyaṃ parābhimataṃ vyañjayannāha -- yathā'vayavi dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karmeti
T16n1289u_001:863: samavāye tu na tadubhayamapīti tebhyo viṣeṣaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:867: tatra sarvasya vastunaḥ kṣaṇikatvasamarthanenaiva nityadravyanirāsāt tasya pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ nirastaṃ bhavati |
T16n1289u_001:868: atha yadavayavi dravyaṃ tasya pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ nirasyati -- tathāhi ghaṭādāvityādinā |
T16n1289u_001:873: paramāṇavo nityā adṛśyā iti ca yatsattatkṣaṇikamityato nirastam |
T16n1289u_001:874: yadupalabhyate sthūlamiti tatra bhāgā eva aṃśā eva hi dṛśyante natvaṃśī kaścidavayavī,
T16n1289u_001:875: pūrvāparādivibhāgeṣu yadā pūrvo bhāgo dṛśyate tadā tu nāparaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:876: apare vibhāge tu cakṣuḥpathāgocare naiva bhavati nīlādyavadhāraṇam |
T16n1289u_001:877: kimaparo vibhāgo nīlo vā śukla iti saṃśaya eva |
T16n1289u_001:880: tasmāt keśa eko nopalabhyate sa eva saṃhata upalabhyate,
T16n1289u_001:884: ato yuktaṃ bhāgā eva bhāsanta iti |
T16n1289u_001:889: na hi tantubhyo'nyaḥ pato nāmāvayavī dṛśyate,
T16n1289u_001:890: tathā tathā saṃniviṣṭāstantava eva tu dṛśyante |
T16n1289u_001:893: dūṣaṇaprakāraścāyaṃ--gṛhābyantarasthite ghaṭādau mahati kuñcikādisūkṣmavivaravartinā''lokena dṛśyamāne samupalabhyate nīlamaṃśataḥ,
T16n1289u_001:896: tathā āmraphale kasmiṃścidāsvādyamāne āsvādyamānāṃśe samupalabhyamāno madhurarasaḥ sarvāṃśenopalabhyeta,
T16n1289u_001:899: aṃśā eva tūpalabhyanta iti tu susyitam |
T16n1289u_001:901: kṣaṇavināśiṣu sarveṣu bhāveṣu kriyāyāḥ kaḥ prasaṅgaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:905: pramitau yat karaṇaṃ tat pramāṇamiti siddhyati |
T16n1289u_001:908: tatkaraṇaṃ ca tato'nyat pramāṇabhūtaṃ jñānaṃ kiṃ,
T16n1289u_001:916: tadevamekasyaiva pratyakṣasya dvairūpyate sati tatra yāṃīlākāravyāvṛttilakṣaṇā nīlākāratā jñānasya,
T16n1289u_001:918: yā cānīlabodhavyāvṛttilakṣaṇā nīlabodhātmatā saiva tasya phalarūpatā,
T16n1289u_001:925: sādhyasādhanabhāvanibandhano hi sa iti śaṅkāṃ vyudasyannāha--etaccetyanena |
T16n1289u_001:927: ekasyāpyākārabhedena sa hyupapadyate yadyapyatra nāsti paramārthato bhedo vastunaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:930: iyaṃ ca phalaphalibhāvavyavasthā pratyakṣasamanantarasamutpannena savikalpakena vyavasthāpyata iti |
T16n1289u_001:931: āha ca dharmottarācāryaḥ--'tasmādasārūpyavyāvṛttyā sārūpyaṃ jñānasya vyavasthāpanahetuḥ anīlabodhavyāvṛttyā ca nīlabodharūpatvaṃ vyavasthāpyaṃ,
T16n1289u_001:938: iti | vyākhyātaṃ caitat kamalaśīlena--'bāhye'rthe prameye viṣayādhigamaḥ pramāṇaphalaṃ,
T16n1289u_001:942: samanantaraślokavyākhyāne ca --nīlāspadaṃ saṃvedanaṃ na pītasyeti viṣayādhigati-vyavasthāyā arthasārūpyameva nibandhanaṃ nānyaditi vyavasthāpyavyavasthāpakabhāvena
T16n1289u_001:943: ' ' tasmāt sākārameva jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ na nirākāraṃ..................... vyavasthā ca tatpṛṣṭhalabdhena vikalpena veditavye'ti |
T16n1289u_001:947: nīlādinā bāhyena jñāne āhitaḥ svākāraḥ pramāṇaṃ svasaṃvittiḥ phalaṃ,
T16n1289u_001:965: iti | pratyakṣe pramāṇatatphalayorvastubhedo nāstītyatra dharmakīrtavacanaṃ pramāṇayati-yathoktamiti |
T16n1289u_001:973: lakṣaṇa eva hi prathamato jijñāsā samudeti |
T16n1289u_001:975: sati samanugate lakṣaṇe prathamaṃ tadeva nirūpaṇiyam |
T16n1289u_001:979: tat prathamaṃ vibhajyaiva tayorlakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamiti yukto vibhāgaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1004: saktasaṃsūcaka evānumānasaṃjñāniveśāt tenendriyasyāvinābhāvitvasaṃbandhajñānasya ca parārthānumānatvaprasaṅgādatiprasaṅgo na bhavati |
T16n1289u_001:1014: sapakṣeṣu saṃbaddhaṃ vipakṣebhyo vyāvṛttaṃ pakṣe ca saṃbaddhaṃ liṅgaṃ paśyataḥ pakṣāṃśena bhavati liṅge sādhyāvinābhāvitvaniścaya iti bhāvaḥ
T16n1289u_001:1020: tatra pakṣadharmatāsaṃjñakaṃ prathamaṃ rūpamāha--anumeye sattvameva niścitamiti |
T16n1289u_001:1031: tatra pakṣa-sattvaṃ cedrūpaṃ neṣyate tadā'siddhe liṅgābhāse'tiprasaṅgaḥ syāttannimasāya tadrūpamupāttamiti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1038: nānena sarveṣu taruṣu siṣādhayiṣitaṃ cetanatvaṃ siddhyet,
T16n1289u_001:1039: tasmāt pakṣaikadeśāsiddhaḥ asartyevakāre kasmiṃścittarau vivakṣitasya svāpasya sattvādatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt |
T16n1289u_001:1043: paśyato'sya taṃ dhūmo vā bāṣpo veti yadā saṃśayo'bhūt,
T16n1289u_001:1046: atra pakṣasattvaṃ mātrajñātamiti bhavatyatiprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1049: trarūpyāṃśe ced bhramastena jāyamānaṃ jñānaṃ nānumānaṃ bhrama eva,
T16n1289u_001:1051: na hyakṣamiva sattayaiva liṅgaṃ jñānaṃ janayituṃ prabhavati |
T16n1289u_001:1057: tathā ca sati bhavatyasādhāraṇe sapakṣavipakṣavyāvṛtte pakṣamātravṛttāvasādhāraṇe'tiprasaṅga iti |
T16n1289u_001:1060: iti ca vartata ityarthaḥ -- liṅgasyedaṃ dvitīyaṃ rūpamapi vartata iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1065: yadyapi tṛtīyaṃ rūpaṃ vipakṣe'sattvamityetanna viruddha iti na tatrātiprasaṅgāvakāśaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1067: saṃpakṣa eva sattvamiti dvitīyarūpagamyaṃ tu tat |
T16n1289u_001:1068: upātte tu vipakṣāsattve sapakṣe sattvopādānasya asādhāraṇavyāvṛttiḥ prayojanam |
T16n1289u_001:1069: śabdo nityaḥ śrāvaṇatvādityatra pakṣamātravṛtti śrāvaṇatvaṃ vipakṣata iva sapakṣato'pi hi vyāvṛttam |
T16n1289u_001:1070: sattvaśabdātpūrvasminnevakāreṇeti sapakṣe sattvamevetyanuktvā sapakṣa eva sattvamityuktyetyarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1071: sattvamevetyuktāvayogavyavacchedena sarveṣu sapakṣeṣu sattvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ syāt,
T16n1289u_001:1072: tathā ca sati--prayatnānantarīyakatvena liṅgena śabde'nityatvasādhanaṃ vyāhanyeta |
T16n1289u_001:1074: nahi vidyudādāvanityatayā niścate prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ netyetāvatā tasyānityatvasādhakatvaṃ hīyate |
T16n1289u_001:1075: sapakṣeṣu sattvamevetyayogavyavacchedārthakaivakāragrahaṇe tu vidyudādau prayatnānantarīyakatvābhāvena tasya hetutvaṃ hīyate iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1086: dvitīyasya rūpasya sapakṣe sattvasyābhāvāditi śaṅkā parāstā |
T16n1289u_001:1088: vipakṣaikadeśavṛtteritiśeṣaḥ dhūme sādhye'gnau hetau sādhāraṇe'sti pakṣe sattvaṃ sapakṣe ca mahānasādau sattvam,
T16n1289u_001:1089: vipakṣe ca kvacit hrade'sattvaṃ ceti trayāṇāmapi rūpāṇāṃ sattvādatiprasaṅgaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1090: evakāragrahaṇe cāyogavyavacchedalābhāt sarvebhyo vipakṣebhyo vyāvṛttatvalābhāt vipakṣe'yogolake vahneḥ sattvānnātiprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1091: nanu sapakṣa eva sattvamityavadhāraṇagarbhaṃ dvitīyaṃ rūpamuktam,
T16n1289u_001:1097: tat adhunā avadhāraṇāghaṭitameva tu dvitīyaṃ rūpaṃ bodhyam |
T16n1289u_001:1099: vītarāgo'pi lokakalyāṇāyedaṃ vaktīti vadantaṃ vādiṇaṃ prayogeṇa nirasyati kaścit--avītarāgo'yaṃ puruṣaḥ vaktṛtvāt rathyāpuruṣavat iti |
T16n1289u_001:1103: sa na vaktā iti upalakhaṇḍādinidarśanena vyatireke samarthyamāne bhavati saṃśayaḥ upalagvaṇḍasyāvaktṛtvaṃ kiṃ vītarāgatvakṛtamuta svata eveti,
T16n1289u_001:1107: idaṃ ca vākyaṃ 'niścitagrahaṇene'tyataḥ prāk 'evakāreṇa sādhāraṇasye'tyatraiva sthānamarhati |
T16n1289u_001:1108: iha tu--evakāraḥ asattvagrahaṇātprāgeva 'asapakṣa evāsattva'miti kuto nopātta ityasya prayojanaṃ vaktavyam,
T16n1289u_001:1109: tacca dharmoddharācāryeṇo dāhṛtam--'asattvavacanāt pūrvasminnavadhāraṇe'yamarthaḥ syāt vipakṣe eva yo nā'sti sa hetuḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1110: tathā ca prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ sapakṣe'pi sarvatra nāsti |
T16n1289u_001:1116: ayamāśayaḥ--tridhā bhavanti vipakṣāḥ sādhyābhāvavān sādhyavadanya sādhyaviruddhaśceti |
T16n1289u_001:1125: yatra na vahnistatra na dhūma ityabhāvato bhavati vipakṣaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:1126: yatra tu tādātmyaṃ--vṛkṣatādātmyaṃ śiśupāyāṃ tatra yo na vṛkṣaḥ sa na śiśupeti bhedataḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1127: uṣṇo'yaṃ pradeśo vahnerityatra uṣṇaviruddhaḥ śītaḥ pradeśo bhavati vipakṣaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:1131: teṣveteṣu vipakṣeṣu yathāyogyaṃ vyatireko bodhya iti vivekadyotanāya tṛtīyasya pṛthagupādānamiti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1134: anvayayirūpavat vyatirekirūpamapi yo dhūmavān so'gnimān yo niragnaḥ sa nirdhūma iti prayoktavyamityetajjñāpanāyeti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1135: yadvā--prayoge kartavye niyamajñāpanārtham--ayamāśayaḥ--prayoge hi anvayo vyatireko vā niyamavāneva prayoktavyo na tadvirahitaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1136: anyathā śyāmo'yaṃ tatputratvādityapi prayogaḥ sādhuḥ syāt,
T16n1289u_001:1138: yastu na śyāmaḥ sa na tatputra iti anvayavyatirekayoḥ prayogasaṃbhavāt |
T16n1289u_001:1142: sati niyame dvayoranyataraprayoga eva tu paryāptaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:1148: trirūpāṇīti padaṃ vyācaṣṭe--trīṇi rūpāṇi yeṣāṃ tānīti |
T16n1289u_001:1151: sukhapratipatteḥ prasiddheśca vibhajanakramavyutkrameṇa trīṇi tāni nirūpayati--tatra kāryamityādinā prayogamukhena |
T16n1289u_001:1172: nanvanavayavabhūtamapi yathā mahānase iti dṛṣṭāntapadaṃ prayujyate,
T16n1289u_001:1173: tathā pratijñāvacanaṃ prathamaṃ prayoge siṣādhayiṣitajñāpanāya prayoktavyamiticet evaṃ sati vādinaṃ prativādinaṃ vā prayoganirdeśe pravartayat 'śabdasyānityatvaṃ sādhaya,
T16n1289u_001:1174: nityatvaṃ sādhaye' tyādi prerayiturvacanamapi tathā syāt |
T16n1289u_001:1185: iti | pratijñāyā avayavānaṅgatvenānupayuktatve siddhe pañcamyantahetuprayogasya kvopayoga ityāha -- pratijñāmantareṇeti |
T16n1289u_001:1193: ataeva ca nigamanamucyate anena cābādhitatvāśaṅkā nirasyata iti cet |
T16n1289u_001:1195: yat śaṅkāvakāśa-eva nāstiḥ vyāptipakṣadharmatāvacanābhyāmeva pakṣe sādhyasya niścayāt |
T16n1289u_001:1200: na viparyayaśaṅkā'sti vyarthaṃ nigamanaṃ vacaḥ ||' iti |
T16n1289u_001:1203: dṛśye agnyādau sādhye dṛśyo dhūmādiriti yāvat |
T16n1289u_001:1209: tasmāt pratyakṣānupalabdhā agneḥ kāryaṃ dhūma iti niścīyata iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1211: cakṣurāderadṛśyatvena pratyakṣānupalambhasyāsaṃbhavāt kādācitkatvena rūpādijñānasya cakṣurādikāryatvaṃ niścīyate iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1219: na ca rūpātmā rasa iti pareṣāmāśaṅkāyāmucyate -- ekasāmagryadhīnatvena bhavati rasena rūpānumānamiti |
T16n1289u_001:1234: tasmin rūpasantānalakṣaṇe puñje pūrvarasaḥ sahakārikāraṇamisyate uttarapuñje rasānubhavāt |
T16n1289u_001:1236: evaṃ ca sati rūpasāmagrī rasaghaṭitā rasasāmagrī rūpaghaṭitā,
T16n1289u_001:1241: hetoryā sattā tayaiva bhavituṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa svasattāmātrabhāvī,
T16n1289u_001:1242: tasmin sādhye sa hetuḥ svabhāva ucyate |
T16n1289u_001:1246: tasmin sādhye svabhāvo heturucyate iti saṃbandhaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1256: avagata eva sa vṛkṣa iti siddhasya kathaṃ sādhyateti |
T16n1289u_001:1259: āha ca dharmottarācāryaḥ--'pracuraśiṃśupe deśe'viditaśiṃśupāvyavahāro jaḍaḥ kenaciduccāṃ śiṃśupāmupadarśyocyate vṛkṣo'yamiti,
T16n1289u_001:1262: tadā sa mūḍhaḥ śiṃśupātvamātranimitte vṛkṣavyavahāre pravartyate' iti |
T16n1289u_001:1283: upalambhasya yāni pratyayāntarāṇi--ālambanādanyāni kāraṇāni indriyādīni tatsākalyāt |
T16n1289u_001:1301: paryudāsavṛttyāśrayaṇena anyasya yasyakasyacit jñānamanupalabhaśabdārthatayā na grāhyamityāha--nāpītti |
T16n1289u_001:1306: na tu yaḥ kaścana pradeśo yatkiñcid jñānamiti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1307: uktaṃ ca dharmottarācāryeṇa--'tasmāt sa eva ghaṭaviviktapradeśastadālambanaṃ ca jñānaṃ dṛśyānupalambhaniścayahetutvād dṛśyānupalambha ucyate' iti |
T16n1289u_001:1311: abhāve pratyakṣeṇāvagamyamāne tadvyavahāro'pi nenaiva bhavediti tasya vā kutaḥ sādhanāpekṣā,
T16n1289u_001:1316: tamimaṃ bhedamabhipretya karmadharmapakṣe svabhāvaṃ saṃbandhaṃ kartṛdharmapakṣe kāryatvaṃ saṃbandhaṃ copapādayati--tathāhītyādinā |
T16n1289u_001:1324: deśataḥ kālataḥ svabhāvato vā yo viprakṛṣṭaḥ sa hi nopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:1329: idaṃ ca ' amūḍhasmṛtisaṃskārasye'tyādi 'sādhinī' tyantaṃ vacanamācāryadharmakīrtinā nyāyabindāvuktam |
T16n1289u_001:1330: (nyāya vi. 105) ayamasyārthaḥ--amūḍhaḥ abhraṣṭaḥ smṛtijanakaḥ saṃskāro yasmin ghaṭādāvarthe so'yamamūḍhasmṛtisaṃskāraḥ,
T16n1289u_001:1332: tathā vartamānasya ca pratipattṛpratyakṣasya--pratipattuḥ pratyakṣo ghaṭādirarthaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:1334: nyāyabinduṭīkāyāṃ cedaṃ vacanaṃ vistareṇa vyākhyātam | (nyāya vi. ṭī. 33)
T16n1289u_001:1353: atra ca dhūmakāraṇasya vyavahitatvenādṛśyatayā kāryānupalambho bhavati liṅgam |
T16n1289u_001:1357: niṣedhyasya dhūmasya yatkāraṇaṃ dahanastasyānupalabdheridaṃ sādhyate --nātra dhūmo dahanābhāditi |
T16n1289u_001:1358: nanu dahanasced dṛśyeta tatprabhavo dhūmo'pi dṛśyetaiva,
T16n1289u_001:1359: yadi sa nopalabhyate sopīti dṛśyānupalambhenaiva dhūmābhāvasyāpi niścayasaṃbhavāt kimiti tatsādhanaprasaṅgaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1360: ucyate--viralatamasi prabhātasamaye hrade hemantasamaye aghisalilaṃ paritaḥ prasṛtaṃ bāṣpamavalokya dhūmo'yatisandihānaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:1367: yastu avagataśiṃśupāviśeṣaḥ tasya tu dṛśyānupalabdhyaiva tadabhāvaḥ siddhati | 4 |
T16n1289u_001:1385: sarvaṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvana kāraṇasantāneṣu pūrvapūrveṣu na sarvameva kāryotpādanasamaryam,
T16n1289u_001:1386: tathā sati pūrvapūryasamaya eva kāryotpādaprasaṅgāt tasmāt pūrvapūrvakṣaṇātmani kāraṇasantāne yadantimakṣaṇātmakaṃ kāryādavyahitapūrvakṣaṇarūpaṃ tadevāpratibaddhasāmarthyamityāśayaḥ | 6 |
T16n1289u_001:1397: yadā dūrātpaśyati puruṣaṃ vahniṃ ca tatrāyaṃ prayogo bhavati |
T16n1289u_001:1401: sannihite tu puruṣe upalambhayogyasyāpi romaharṣādiviśeṣasyānupalambhād dṛśyānupalabdhyaiva tadabhāvaḥ sidhyet |
T16n1289u_001:1402: tathopalambhayogyasya śītasyānupalabdhyā kāraṇānupalabdhyaiva tasya siddhiḥ syāt | 7 |
T16n1289u_001:1406: tuṣārasparśo yadā nopalambhayogyo nāpi śītaṃ tatra vahnimātropalambhādbhavatyayaṃ hetuḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1409: pratiṣedhyasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya yo viruddhastasya yat kāryaṃ tasyopalabdhirityarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1412: svabhāve upalambhayogye'nupalabhyamāne tu svabhāvānupalabdhyaiva pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyet tadviruddhe copalabhyamāne viruddhopalambhādeva pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyet | 9 |
T16n1289u_001:1414: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāryaṃ tasya yo viruddhastasya yat kāryaṃ tasyopalabdhirityarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1416: śītakāraṇānāṃ tatkāryasya śītasya tadviruddhasya vahneśca yadā nopalambhayogyatā tadā'yaṃ hetuḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1417: anyathā tu svabhāve upalambhayogye'nupalabhyamāne svabhāvānupalabdhyaiva pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyet |
T16n1289u_001:1421: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāraṇaṃ tasya yo viruddhaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:1422: tasya yat kāryaṃ tasyopalabdherityarthaḥ udāharati--na romaharṣādīti |
T16n1289u_001:1423: pratiṣedhye romaharṣādau tatkāraṇe kāraṇaviruddhe copalambhāyogye bhavatyayaṃ hetuḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1425: kāraṇe vā upalambhayogye'nupalabhyamāne svabhāvānupalabdhyā kāraṇānupalabdhyā vā kāraṇaviruddhe upalabhyamāne kāraṇaviruddhopalambhena vā pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyet | 11 |
T16n1289u_001:1427: pratiṣedhyasya yad vyāpakaṃ tasya yadviruddhaṃ tasya yatkāryaṃ tadupalabdhirityarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1429: dūrādeva dhūmamātraṃ paśyatastena bhavati nātra tuṣārasparśa iti tatpratiṣedhānumānam |
T16n1289u_001:1430: tuṣārasparśaṃ tadvyāpake śīte vopalambhayogye'nupalabhyamāne tadviruddhe vahnau vopalabhyamāne svabhāvānupalabdhirvyāpakānupalabdhiḥ vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhirvā syāt | 12 |
T16n1289u_001:1432: pratiṣedhyasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya yo viruddhastasya yadyāptaṃ tasyopalabdhirityarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1438: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāryaṃ tasya yadviruddhaṃ tasya yadvyāptaṃ tasyopalabdhirityarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1441: kārye vahnāvupalambhayogye'nupalabhyamāne tu kāryānupalabdhiḥ syāt tadviruddhe śīte upalabhyamāne kāryaviruddhopalabdhireva liṅga syāt,
T16n1289u_001:1444: pratiṣedhyasya yat kāraṇaṃ tasya yat viruddhaṃ tasya yadvyāpyaṃ tadupalabdhirityarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1449: iha tu kāraṇaviruddhavyāptatuṣāramātramanubhūyata iti tena dhūmapratiṣedhāt kāraṇaviruddhavyāptopalabdherbhavati kāryapratiṣedhaḥ | 15 |
T16n1289u_001:1451: pratiṣedhyasya yabdyāpakaṃ tasya yadviruddhaṃ tasya yadavyāptaṃ tasyopalabdhirityarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1454: iha tu tadviruddhavyāptopalambhāt vyāpakapratiṣedha iti viśeṣaḥ | 16 |
T16n1289u_001:1494: idaṃ ca svabhāvahetoḥ sādharmyavataḥ prayogasyodāharaṇaṃ bhavitumarhati,
T16n1289u_001:1498: jñānamātrāstitve tu sarvamiti nirdeśo nātīva svarasaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1499: yadvā--sādharmyavantaṃ prayogaṃ pradarśayituṃ sautrāntikamatamāśritya vyutpādyate ityanvayaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1509: ta ete samavetā hetavaḥ pratyayā ucyanta ityabhipretyāha--pretyayairiti |
T16n1289u_001:1510: hetuṃ hetuṃ prati ayante hetvantarāṇīti teṣāmayamānānāṃ yo bhāvaḥ sa pratyaya ucyate |
T16n1289u_001:1516: tatrāpi kṣaṇikatvaṃ neti pareṣāṃ vādastu pratyakṣopahataḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1517: saugataṃmanyāḥ vātsīputrīyāḥ punaḥ buddhiśabdādīnāṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ ghaṭādīnāmakṣaṇikatvaṃ cābhyupagacchanti |
T16n1289u_001:1518: tān pratyeṣa prayogaḥ -- buddhiśabdādaya iva sarvameva kṣaṇikam saṃskṛtatvāditi |
T16n1289u_001:1519: kṣaṇikamityetad vyācaṣṭe--utpattikṣāṇa eveti utpattikṣaṇamātrasthāyitā kṣaṇikatvamiti yāvat |
T16n1289u_001:1520: nanu kathaṃ kṣaṇikatvaṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ tiṣṭhanti khalu te samutpannā utpattyanantaramapīti-śaṅkāṃ nirasyannāha--sarvaṃ tāvadityādinā |
T16n1289u_001:1525: nanu nāvinaśvarasvabhāvā na vā vinaśvarasvabhāvā utpadyante kintu kiyantaṃ kālaṃ sthitisvabhāvā utpādyante ityāśaṅkāmanūdya nirasyati--athedṛśa eva svabhāva iti |
T16n1289u_001:1527: ayamāśayaḥ-- kiyantaṃ kālaṃ sthitveti yā kila maryādā kalpyate seyamaniyateti punarapi tāvantaṃ kālaṃ kuto'yaṃ na tiṣṭhet svabhāvāniyateranavasthiteriti
T16n1289u_001:1539: tasmāt nāśakasamavadhāne nāśo jāyate nocenneti kathaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgaprasādhanamiticet |
T16n1289u_001:1543: na ca vināśo nāma kimapi vastu |
T16n1289u_001:1555: āha ca kamalaśīlaḥ--'bhāvasya hi karaṇaṃ bhavati,
T16n1289u_001:1558: ato bhāvābhāvātmakaḥ-- bhāvaniṣedhātmako nāśo na kenacit kriyate avastutvāt kharaviṣāṇavat ' iti |
T16n1289u_001:1562: vinaśvarasvabhāvasya kṣaṇikatāṃ prayogeṇa sādhayannāha--prayogaḥ punaraḥ kartavya iti |
T16n1289u_001:1569: utpāde nairantaryaṃ apareṣu pūrvasādṛśyaṃ ca viśadayannāha--pūrvakṣāṇavināśakālaeva tatsadṛśaṃ kṣaṇāntaramudayata iti |
T16n1289u_001:1570: ghaṭātmako yaḥ pūrvakṣāṇaḥ tadvināśakāla eva tatsadṛśaṃ ghaṭātmakaṃ kṣāṇāntaramudayata ityarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1583: avyaktabhede iha tu kiṃpunarnyāya-siddho'bhedabhrama iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1591: ātmākāśādayo hi nityā bhāvāḥ santīti parapakṣavāsanāmūlakāṃ śaṅkāṃ pariharan sarvaśabdena kroḍīkṛtaṃ viśadayati--pramāṇapratītāḥ padārthā iti
T16n1289u_001:1592: ātmādiṣu pramāṇaṃ nāstīti te śasaśṛṅgāyanta iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1601: saiva vyāvṛttiḥ kalpitaṃ dharmabhedamāśritya nīlasyotpattiriti anīlavyāvṛttyātmano vyavacchedena vyatiriktevocyate |
T16n1289u_001:1603: tamimaṃ kalpitaṃ viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhedamāśritya utpattimattvāditi heturayaṃ prayukta iti saviśeṣaṇasvabhāvaheturayaṃ bhavatīti |
T16n1289u_001:1606: tat sanniti śabdo'pi asadvyāvṛtte'sadvyāvṛttyā pravartate tat satvāditi yaḥ svabhāvahetuḥ prāk pradarśitaḥ so'pyutpattimattvamiva saviśeṣaṇaheturbhavitumarhatīti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1609: pūrvasmin 'yatsattadanityaṃ santaścāmī bhāvā' ityasmin prayoge sadityeva dharmī nirdiśyate |
T16n1289u_001:1611: nātra sattvenāsattvavyāvṛttirūpeṇa kalpitena dharmabhedena kimapi viśeṣyate,
T16n1289u_001:1614: utpattimāṃśca śabda ityatra yadutpattimadityutpattyā viśeṣato dharmī nirdiśyate anutpattivyāvṛttilakṣaṇayotpattyā viśeṣitastato vyatirikta iva dharmī nirdiśyate |
T16n1289u_001:1615: utpattimāṃśca śabda iti śabdasya dharmiṇo dharma iva samāropitabhedā utpattirnirdiśyate |
T16n1289u_001:1623: devadattāddharmiṇo bahirbhūtāścitrā gāvo viśeṣaṇatayā viśeṣaṇatayā vivakṣitā iti bhinnaviśeṣaṇatā tatra vyaktaṃ gamyate,
T16n1289u_001:1624: kṛtakamiti nirdeśastu kāryamiti nirdeśādaviśiṣṭaḥ kāryasvabhāvaṃ kāryatāmeva gamayatīti kathaṃ bhinnaviśeṣaṇateti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1628: itthaṃ ca citraguśabdavat dharmisvarūpānantargataparavyāpārasāpekṣatvasya viśeṣaṇasyāvabodhanāt bhinnaviśeṣaṇasvabhāvahetorayaṃ prayogo bhavitumarhatīti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1630: apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ kṛtaka' iti (nyā. bi. pa. 109) |
T16n1289u_001:1631: vyākhyātaṃ caitat dharmottarācāryeṇa--'upādhibhedena svabhāvasya prayoga iti saṃbandhaḥ upādhirviśeṣaṇaṃ,
T16n1289u_001:1632: tasya bhedena bhinnopādhinā viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvahetuḥ prayukta ityarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1641: kṛtakatvaṃ vyatiriktaviśeṣaṇam x x x x x yasmādapekṣitaparavyāpāraḥ kṛtaka ucyate tasmād vyatiriktena viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ svabhāvaḥ ucyate |
T16n1289u_001:1656: mandasya nāyaṃ svabhāva iti vyāmohaḥ syāt,
T16n1289u_001:1659: āha ca dharmottarācāryaḥ--' tadevaṃ trividhaḥ svabhāvahetuprayogo darśitaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:1662: mābhūdvācakabhedātkvacitsvabhāvahetāvapi prayukte vyāmoha iti ' iti (nyā. bi. ṭī. 31)
T16n1289u_001:1669: idaṃ ca nidarśanaṃ sarvāstitvavādibhiḥ saugataikadeśibhiḥ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtabhedena saṃgṛhya dvedhā vibhakte āryasatye'saṃskṛtakoṭau ākāśapratisaṃkhyānirodhāpratisaṃkhyānirodhānāṃ trayāṇāṃ gaṇanāt bodhyam |
T16n1289u_001:1679: tathātvāt sa sādhyābhāvaḥ sādhanābhāve niyataḥ sādhanābhāvavato'nyatra netyetat |
T16n1289u_001:1680: yathā svakarmaṇyeva niyata ityukte svakarmaṇo'nyatrānanvayo gamyate tathā tena sādhanābhāve sādhyābhāvavyāpakatā labhyate |
T16n1289u_001:1681: tathā ca vyāpakanivṛttyā vyāpyanivṛttiḥ sidhyatīti bodhyam |
T16n1289u_001:1682: anantarānavasthāyitvābhāvasya yadvyāpakamavinaśvarasvarūpatvaṃ tadrūpādibhyo nivartamānamanantarānavasthāyitvābhāvaṃ tebhyo nivartayat teṣāmantantarānavasthāyitāṃ sādhayati--tadetatpratipāditaṃ vinaśvararūpaṃ ca rūpādikamudayakāla iti |
T16n1289u_001:1686: utpattimattvenānityatve sādhye vaidharmyaprayogaṃ pradarśayati--yatrānityatvaṃ nivṛttaṃ tatrotpattimattvamapīti |
T16n1289u_001:1689: kṛtakatvenānityatve sādhye vaidharmyaprayogaṃ pradarśayati -- yatrānityatvaṃ nivṛttaṃ tatra kṛtakatvamapīti |
T16n1289u_001:1692: padāntaropasthāpitavyatiriktaviśeṣaṇasya svabhāvahetorvaidharmyaṃ darśayati--yatra kṛtakatvaṃ nāsti tatra pratyayabhedabheditvamapīti |
T16n1289u_001:1702: evaṃ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ yayoranvayavyatirekasahacārāvavadhāryete tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo'vagamyate iti |
T16n1289u_001:1703: anavadhārite ca kāryakāraṇabhāve pareṇāpādyamānāprayojakāśaṅkā na nivārayituṃ śakyeteti kāryahetuṃ prayuñjatā prathamaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāmavadhārya iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1706: avayevebhyo'tiriktaḥ kaścidavayavī avayaveṣu samaveta iti vadato nirākaraṇāyānupalabdhihetuḥ prayujyate |
T16n1289u_001:1710: tatra yadyatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate tattatrāsadvyavahārayogyaṃ yathā naraśirasi śṛṅgam,
T16n1289u_001:1712: nopalabhyate cātropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaḥ parābhimato'vayavī kapāleṣviti pakṣadharmatāpratipādakaṃ vākyam |
T16n1289u_001:1715: yo yena prakāreṇa parairabhimato'vayavī sa tathā naivopalabhyate,
T16n1289u_001:1716: nahi bhūtale ghaṭa iva bhūtalādatiriktastadādhārakaḥ pratīyate'vayavī avayaveṣu tadādhārakastebhyo'tiriktaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1723: viśeṣaṇavati vartamānastu viśeṣyābhāvarūpa iti sadvyavahārayogye upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvarūpaviśeṣaṇavati vartamāna uktaviśiṣṭābhāvo'nupalabhyamānatvābhavarūpa evetyabhipretya vyatirekavyāptiṃ pradarśayati--yat sadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata eveti |
T16n1289u_001:1724: yattu sadapi nopalabhyate tadupalabdhiyogyaṃ neti viśeṣaṇābhāve viśiṣṭābhāvo bodhyaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1730: tathā ca vyāpakanivṛttyā vyāpyenāpi tato nivṛttena bhāvyamityato'vayavino'vayave'sadvyavahārayogyataiva sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1736: ukteṣu prayogeṣu pareṣāmaprayojakaśaṅkāṃ vārayannāha--tataḥ pramāṇena vyāptisiddhāviti |
T16n1289u_001:1737: ayamāśayaḥ--pratyakṣapramāṇamūlāṃ vyāptiṃ svīkurvatāmasmākaṃ paraiḥ kriyamāṇāyā aprayojakaśaṅkāyā nāvakāśaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1744: śṛṅgasyānyatra sattvaṃ śaśe'sattvaṃ ca śaśaśṛṅgayoḥ svabhāvaviśeṣāveva |
T16n1289u_001:1748: ihānyaḥ sarvajño bhavatu mā vā bhūditi |
T16n1289u_001:1749: atīndriyārthadarśanasamarthaṃ sarvajñaṃ nityamekamīśvaramapyanabhyupagacchanto mīmāṃsakāḥ sarvajñamātranirāsāya prayatante saugatādyabhimatasarvajñapratiṣedhābhiniveśāt
T16n1289u_001:1750: vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ--iha jagati īśvarādanyaḥ sarvajño bhavatu mā vā bhūt |
T16n1289u_001:1756: nirūpayiṣyamāṇe īśvarasādhake prayoge pakṣasapakṣavipakṣavibhāgaṃ prathamataḥ pradarśayannupakramate--trayaḥ khalviti |
T16n1289u_001:1759: ye cānye vanaspatyādayo ye ca mahīmahīdharādayaḥ te sandigdhakartṛkā bhavanti |
T16n1289u_001:1764: anye ca bhavāḥ sapakṣakoṭau vipakṣakoṭau cāntarbhavanti |
T16n1289u_001:1769: yanna kāryaṃ tanna sakartṛkaṃ yathā vyomādi,
T16n1289u_001:1772: sādhyaśarīre buddhimattvaniveśena upādānopakaranādyabhijñena kartrā bhāvyamiti niyamo gamyate |
T16n1289u_001:1776: hetoraṅgāni ca trīṇi pakṣe sattvaṃ sapakṣe ca sattvaṃ,
T16n1289u_001:1796: mano nimittamityetāvatā na bāhyārthapratyakṣaṃ mānasamiti vaktuṃ suśakam |
T16n1289u_001:1798: ghaṭādīnāṃ kāryāṇāṃ kumbhakārādikartṛkatvasya bhūyodarśanāt tatsahakṛtena kāryatvasāmānyalakṣaṇāpratyāsattyā jāyamānena kāryamātrasya sakartṛkatvāvagāhinā'laukikena pratyakṣeṇa sarvatra kārye sakartṛkatvaṃ pratyakṣeṇopalabdhamiti tadāśayaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1800: tathāhītyādimūlavākyaṃ kāryaṃ tāvat kumbhakārāderupajāyamānaṃ bhūyodṛṣṭamiti bhūyodarśanasahāyena pratyakṣeṇa kāryaṃ sakartṛkamityupalabhyata iti kathamapi śeṣapūraṇena vyākhyeyam |
T16n1289u_001:1802: yasmāt kāryasya sakartṛkatvaṃ naisargikamiti pratyakṣeṇāvagataṃ tasmānnedaṃ śaṅkanīyaṃ,
T16n1289u_001:1806: nahi katipayavyaktīnāṃ mithaḥ sāhacaryadarśanamātreṇā tatsāmānyayorvyāptiḥ saṃbhavati |
T16n1289u_001:1807: nahi katipayaghaṭapaṭavyaktīnāṃ sāhacaryadarśanamātrād bhavati ghaṭapaṭasāmānyayorvyāptiriti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1809: ayamāśayaḥ--pratiniyatā hi kāryeṣu tasya tasya sā sā sāmagrī,
T16n1289u_001:1810: nahi ghaṭasya yā sāmagrī sā paṭasya,
T16n1289u_001:1817: yāni ca buddhimatkartṛkāṇyupalabhyante tāni ca dṛśyaśarīrakabuddhimatkartṛkāṇyeva |
T16n1289u_001:1818: tṛṇādīnāmapi pakṣīkaraṇāt na vyabhicārāśaṅketi tu na yuktam |
T16n1289u_001:1819: nahi vyabhicāranivāraṇāya vyabhicāraviṣayasya pakṣīkaraṇaṃ yujyata iti |
T16n1289u_001:1824: iha tu tṛṇādau dṛśyaśarīrasya karturvyatirekaniścayāt tatra tatsādhanāya hetorāśrayo'nupapanna iti |
T16n1289u_001:1829: ataḥ saṃdehāt parvate vahneḥ sādhanaṃ yuktam |
T16n1289u_001:1830: iha tu sādhyavyatireko dṛśyānupalambhena niścita iti mahadasti vaiṣamyamiti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1834: adṛśyaśarīrakatvasya sādhyatāvacchedakakoṭāvanupraveśe kulālādidṛśyapuruṣakartṛkatayā prasiddhe ghaṭādāvanaikāntyāśaṅkā syāditi pakṣāntaramāśrayat--buddhimanmātrasya veti |
T16n1289u_001:1836: sa ca kartā dṛśyaśarīro vā syādadṛśyaśarīro vā,
T16n1289u_001:1844: na hyadṛśyasya piśācāderabhāvo neha piśāca iti cakṣuṣā garītuṃ śakyate |
T16n1289u_001:1845: tathā pratiyogiṣu keṣāṃcidadṛsyasvabhāvatvena na tatsāmānyābhāve dṛśyānupalambhasaṃbhavaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1846: itthaṃ ca tvayā kartṛṣvadṛśyo'pi kartā yadyabhyupagamyeta taddhiṭitakartṛsāmānyābhāvo dṛśyānupalambhābhāvena naivāvadhāryeta |
T16n1289u_001:1847: vastuto ghaṭādiṣvapi tvayā kartṛtayā'bhyupagato buddhimān kartā nityaḥ kaścidātmā,
T16n1289u_001:1848: so'pyadṛśya eveti yogyānupalambhāsaṃbhavena buddhimataḥ karturabhāvo naivāvadhāryeta |
T16n1289u_001:1850: kāryatvasya tato vyāvṛtterapi saṃdehāt tṛṇādiṣvapi tatsaṃdehasyaiva prasaṅgāt kārye kartṛṣāpekṣatvasaṃsayaḥ syādeveti saṃdighavipakṣavyāvṛttikatvaṃ hetordoṣo bhavedeveti |
T16n1289u_001:1851: idamabhihitaṃ bhavati -- buddhimatkartṛkatve sādhye buddhimatkartṛkatvābhāvavān vipakṣaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1854: tathā ca saṃdehena tṛṇādau tadabhāvaḥ sandigdha eveti saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikatvaṃ saṃdigdhānaikāntikatve paryavasitaṃ hetordoṣa eveti |
T16n1289u_001:1856: yathā'sarvajñaḥ kaścidvivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāgādimānveti sādhye vaktṛtvādiko dharmaḥ saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:1857: sarvatraikadeśe vā sarvajño vaktā nopalabhyate ityevaṃprakārasyānupalambhasyādṛśyātmaviṣayatvena saṃdehahetutvā'-diti | (nyā. vi. 112.) |
T16n1289u_001:1861: yadakartṛkaṃ na tadutpattimat yathā vyomādīti nidarśanamupalabhyata evetyatrāha--sādhyābhāvaprayuktasyeti |
T16n1289u_001:1863: vyomādau nityatayā'bhimate kāryatvābhāvaḥ kiṃ kartrabhāvaprayukto vā kartṛnirapekṣakāraṇāntarābhāvaprayukto vetyatra niyāmakābhāvāt kāryatvābhāvasya kartrabhāvaprayuktvānavadhāraṇāt vyāpterasiddheriti |
T16n1289u_001:1867: saṃbhāvyate'tīndriyaḥ kartā cet -- buddhimatā hi kartrā śarīrendriyamanoviśiṣṭena bhāvyam |
T16n1289u_001:1870: na dṛśyate ca śarīrī kartā tṛṇādau |
T16n1289u_001:1871: athātīndriyaśarīro buddhimān kartā tṛṇādau kārye'bhyupagamyate cediti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1874: atha vyatirekasiddhyarthaṃ dṛśyaḥ kartā cettṛṇādāvapyāśrīyate tasya tatrānupalambhādanaikāntikataiva hetorityāśayaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1877: yad utpattimat tat sakartṛkaṃ yathā ghaṭādi,
T16n1289u_001:1881: tādātmyatatadutpattibhyāṃ nāparaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sādhyena hetoriti tu na |
T16n1289u_001:1882: tathā ca sādhanābhāvasya sādhyābhāvaprayuktatvāditi kiṃ prayojyaprayojakabhāvavicāreṇetīmāṃ śaṅkāṃ pariharan parābhimataṃ hetoḥ sādhyena saha svābhāvikatvasaṃbandhavādaṃ nirasyati--yattu trilocanenetyādinā |
T16n1289u_001:1884: dhūmena vahneḥ saṃbandhe ārdrendhanasaṃyoga iva vahninā dhūmasya saṃbandhe na ko'pyupādhirityarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1885: uktaṃ ca vācaspatimiśrarnyāyavartikatātparyaṭīkāyāṃ--' tathāhi dhūmādīnāṃ vahnyādisaṃbandhaḥ svābhāvikaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:1888: yadā tvārdrendhanādisaṃbandhamanubhavanti tadā dhūmādibhiḥ saha saṃbadhyante |
T16n1289u_001:1889: tasmāt vahnyādīnāmardrendhanādyupādhikṛtaḥ saṃbandhaḥ svābhāviko na bhavati |
T16n1289u_001:1898: tasya tena saha saṃbandhe saṃbandhibhyāṃ yadanyadapekṣyate tadupādhiśabdenābhidhīyate ityarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1901: upādhiśaṅkāyā anivāryatayā na svābhāvikasaṃbandhāvadhāraṇaṃ ghaṭeteti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1906: evaṃ sati prāmāṇikānāmanumānena bhavantī lokayātrā nopapadyeta,
T16n1289u_001:1909: idaṃ ca vācaspatimiśrairāśaṅkya parihṛtam--' na cādṛśyamāno'pi darśanānarhatayā sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvena saṃdihyamāna upādhiḥ svābhāvikatvaṃ pratibadhnātīti sāṃpratam |
T16n1289u_001:1910: avaśyaṃ śaṅkayā bhavitavyaṃ niyāmakābhāvāditi dattāvakāśā khalviyaṃ laukikapramāṇamaryādātikrameṇa śaṅkāpiśācī labdhaprasarā na kvacinnāstīti nāyaṃ kvacitpravarteta' iti (nyā. vā. ṭī. 165)
T16n1289u_001:1912: pūrvapūrvakṣaṇānāmuttarottarakṣaṇeṣu hetutve vaktavye pūrvatvasyottaratvasya cāsaṃkhyāteṣu pūrveṣūttareṣu ca sādhāraṇyenātiprasaṅge prasajati deśakāla jātyādinā sādharmasya sarvasya svalakṣaṇatayā anyānyatvaṃ vadatāṃ saugatānāmasaṃbhavādanyatvāviśeṣe'pi kasyacideva kṣaṇasya kasmiṃścideva kṣaṇe hetutvaṃ yathā'bhimataṃ tathā kasyacideva kenacideva svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandha iti mamāpyabhimatamityāśayaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1914: pramāṇasiddhaṃ vahnidhūmayorhetumadbhāvameva tayoḥ saṃbandhaṃ vadatāmasmākaṃ pramāṇaśūnyaṃ svābhāvikaṃ saṃbandhaṃ tayoḥ kalpayatāṃ yuṣmākaṃ ca mahadasti vaiṣamyamiti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1915: svābhāvikaśabdārthaṃ vikalpya dūṣayati--svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandha iti ko'rtha iti |
T16n1289u_001:1916: bhūyodarśanamātrasya vyāptiniścayādhāyakatvaṃ na yujyata ityāśayenāha--sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa vā dṛṣṭāntamātramastīti na vyāpterapi siddhiriti
T16n1289u_001:1924: yo vahnidhūmayoḥ pratibandhaḥ hetuhetumadbhāvalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ tadgrāhakaṃ yatpramāṇaṃ anvayasahacāravyatirekasahacāralakṣaṇaṃ tatsmaraṇadvāreṇetyarthaḥ
T16n1289u_001:1925: gṛhītaṃ vismṛtaṃ ca yatpratibandhagrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ tatsmaraṇadvāreṇeti vā tadarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1927: nahi vyomādau sakartṛkatvābhāvotpattimattvābhāvayoḥ sāhacaryadarśanamātreṇeti prakṛte tātparyam |
T16n1289u_001:1930: ayamāśayaḥ--utpattimattvena buddhimatkartṛkatvaṃ sādhayatā tatra vyomādi vyatirekanidarśanatayā pradarśayatā tvayā vyomādīnāmutpattirāhityasya
T16n1289u_001:1932: tatra buddhimata iva tato'nyasyācetanasyāpi kāraṇasyābhāvo vartata ea |
T16n1289u_001:1933: tathā ca cetanādhiṣṭhitādapi svasvakāraṇād bījādestṛṇādikamudbhavatīti vadatāṃ yo'bhimatastathāvidhakāraṇād bījādestṛṇādikamudbhavatīti vadatāṃ yo'bhimatastathāvidhakāraṇābhāvaḥ tatprayuktatvameva vyomāderanutpattimattve prayojakaṃ kiṃ na syāt |
T16n1289u_001:1935: nāpi ghaṭe kāryatvasya buddhimadanvayadarśanādākāśe'pi buddhimadabhāvādeva kartṛtvābhāvo vaktuṃ yujyata iti |
T16n1289u_001:1936: ghaṭe kāryatvasya buddhimadanvayadarśane taṃ vinā tasyotpattirmābhūt |
T16n1289u_001:1938: nahyanyatra dṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇamanyatra na dṛśyata ityetāvatā'nyasyānutpattau tattantraṃ bhavediti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1939: nanu dhūmena vahnyādau sādhye vipakṣe dhūmasyādarśanāt dhūmābhāvo vahnyabhāvaprayukto yathā bhavati,
T16n1289u_001:1940: tathā vyomni vipakṣe upalabhyamāna utpattyabhāvo buddhimadabhāvaprayuktaḥ kiṃ na syādityāśaṅkyāha--kiṃcādarśanamātreṇeti |
T16n1289u_001:1941: vipakṣe hetoradarśanamātreṇa cet tasya vyatirekaḥ sidhyet,
T16n1289u_001:1943: na ca hetoradarśanamātreṇa hetvabhāvaḥ sidhyatīti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1954: tasmāt sādhyasādhanayorhatuhetumadbhāve tādātmye vā pratibandhe satyeva sādhyābhāvaprayuktaḥ sādhanābhāvo bhavet |
T16n1289u_001:1955: anyatra tu saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikatve hetordoṣo'parihārya eveti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1957: idaṃ tu vācaspatimiśrāṇāṃ vacanam 'tasmāt prāmāṇikalokayātrāmanupālayatā yathādarśanaṃ śaṅkanīyam |
T16n1289u_001:1961: tasmādupādhiṃ prayatnato'nviṣyanto'nupalabhamānā nāstītyavagamya svābhāvikatvaṃ saṃbandhasya niścinumaḥ' iti |
T16n1289u_001:1963: ayamāśayaḥ--nanu sādhyasādhanayostādātmyena tadutpattyā vā saṃbandhena bhāvyam,
T16n1289u_001:1965: sādhanaṃ tu syāditi sādhyasaṃśayasamudbhavādaprayojakaśaṅkā samavataredeveti cenna |
T16n1289u_001:1966: vahnidhūmayoḥ sāhacarye bhūyassvadhikaraṇeṣu bhūyodṛṣṭe dhūmasya vahninā saha saṃbandhe upādhāvanupalabhyamāne parvate dhūmaṃ paśyato na tatra vahneḥ saṃśayaḥ syāt |
T16n1289u_001:1968: vahnivirahitasya dhūmavataḥ kasyaciddeśasya prāganubhūtasya smaraṇe satyeva bhavet |
T16n1289u_001:1969: yathā dhūmavahnyośśataśaḥ sahacāradarśane'pi dhūmarahitasya vahnimato'yogolakasya prāganubhūtasya smaraṇāt parvatādau vahnau dṛśyamāne bhavedeva dhūme śaṃśayaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1970: tathā pārthivatva lohalekhyatvayoḥ śataśaḥ sahacāradarśane'pi lohalekhyatvābhāvavataḥ pārthivasya vajramaṇeḥ smaraṇe bhavedeva prārthive'pi kvacillohalekhyatve saṃśayaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1975: ayamāśayaḥ --katipayaprameyeṣu bhūyodṛṣṭavahnisāhacaryaṣvapi dṛṣṭādṛṣṭasādhāraṇatvena prameyatvasya prameye dṛśyamāne'pi bhavati yathā vahnau saṃśayastathā katipayadhūmeṣu dṛṣṭakatipayavahnisāhacaryeṣvapi dhūmatvasya dṛṣṭasāhacaryādṛṣṭasāhacaryasādhāraṇatayā prabandhaviśeṣānabhyupagame dṛṣṭe'pi dhūme bhavedeva vahnau śaṃśayaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:1976: evaṃ katipayakāryeṣu dṛṣṭakartrapekṣeṣvapi kāryatvasya dṛṣṭakartrapekṣādṛṣṭakartrapekṣasādhāraṇatayā dṛśyamāne'pyaṅkurādau kārye bhavedeva kartrapekṣāyāṃ saṃśaya iti yathādarśanameva bhavati saṃśayāvasara iti |
T16n1289u_001:1979: saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikatve paroktahetoḥ saddūṣaṇe'smābhirāpādite'saddoṣodbhāvanaṃ nāma nigrahasthānamityasmān prati vadan vādī asatyapi nigrahasthāne nigrahasthānamudbhāvayan svavacanena svayameva niranuyojyānuyogalakṣaṇena nigrahasthānena gṛhīto bhavatīti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1980: “anigrahe nigrahasthānābhiyogo niranuyojyānuyogaḥ“ iti ca niranuyojyānuyogalakṣaṇam | (nyā. sū. a. 5 ā. 2 sū. 23 )
T16n1289u_001:1983: asarvajñenaikena buddhimatā bahubhirvā taiḥ saṃbhūya kṛtatve'pi siṣādhayiṣitasaṃpattyā'rthāntaramiti yāvat |
T16n1289u_001:1985: ghaṭādau kulālādyasarvajñakartṛkatayā prasiddhe nityasarvajñaikakartṛkatvasya pramāṇāgamyatvena dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyavikalatayā'naikāntyamiti bhāvaḥ
T16n1289u_001:1990: nahi sarvajñaikakartṛkatvaṃ vinā teṣāṃ kāryatopapadyata iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1992: vinā'pi kartuḥ sarvajñatvādiviśeṣaṃ kāryatvasya pakṣadharmatopapadyata eveti kathaṃ pakṣadharmatābalādviśeṣasiddhirityāśayenāha--yenetyādinā
T16n1289u_001:1995: tena sarvajñena bhāvyamiti ko'yaṃ niyama iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:1997: tṛṇatarulatābhūbhūdharādīnāṃ sarveṣāmeva kartācedekaḥ syāt tadā tena sarvajñena bhāvyam,
T16n1289u_001:1999: tattadupādānādyabhijñaistaistairbahubhiḥ saṃbhūya sarvamidaṃ kṛtamityapi vaktuṃ śakyeta hīti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2015: sādhyena saha hetoḥ pratibandhaḥ pramāṇasiddhaḥ kaścidapekṣyate sa ca tādātmyaṃ tadurpattirvā |
T16n1289u_001:2016: svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandha iti tu na pramāṇasiddham |
T16n1289u_001:2017: ataḥ kāryatvena karturanumānaṃ nopapadyata iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2031: uktaṃ ca dharmakīrtinā--“sādharmyeṇāpi hi prayoge'rthāt vaidharmyagatiḥ,
T16n1289u_001:2033: tathā vaidharmyeṇāpyanvayagatiḥ asati tasmin sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvasyāsiddheḥ“ iti | (nyā. bi. 109)
T16n1289u_001:2034: vyākhyātaṃ caitaddharmottarācāryeṇa--'nanu ca sādharmyavati vyatireko noktaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2042: teṣāṃ bahirvyāptipakṣo'bhimata iti vyāptigrahaṇāya pakṣādanyasyāśrayaṇād bahirvyāptipakṣa ityarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2045: yat sattat kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭa iti bhavati sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaprayoga iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2049: tatra śiṃśapātvasya vṛkṣavyavahārayogyatve sādhye dṛṣṭānte pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptirgrahītavyeti |
T16n1289u_001:2050: sādharmyadṛṣṭānte pratyakṣeṇānvayāvagamāt vaidharmyadṛṣṭānte'nupalambhena vyatirekāvagamācca pratyakṣeṇānupalbhena ca vyāptyavagama ityarthaḥ
T16n1289u_001:2051: yadvṛkṣavyavahārayogyatvaṃ yacca śiṃśupātvaṃ tadubhayamapi vṛkṣasya svabhāvaviśeṣa iti śiṃśupāntareṣu sādharmyadṛṣṭānteṣu pratyakṣeṇa tayoranvayāvadhāranāt
T16n1289u_001:2052: vaidharmyadṛṣṭānteṣu vṛkṣādanyeṣu tayorvyatirekasyānupalanbhenāvadhāraṇāt pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ vyāptyavadhāraṇamiti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2056: yadi kṣāṇikatā na syāt tarhi sattvaṃ na syāt |
T16n1289u_001:2060: ghaṭādiṣu ca bhāveṣu arthakriyāsamartheṣu kṣaṇikatvameveti prasaṅgaviparyayo dṛṣṭaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2064: na bhavanti sthirā bhāvā nissattvāste tato matāḥ |'
T16n1289u_001:2066: vyākhyātaṃ ca kamalaśīlena--'kathaṃ punasya hetorvyāptiḥ siddhetyāha--kṣaṇikatvaviyogetvidyādi |
T16n1289u_001:2068: sthiratayā'bhimateṣu bhāveṣvarthakriyāsāmarthyaṃ nopapadyata ityetat 'tathāhī'tyādinā'sā ca sthireṣu bhāveṣu na ghaṭete'tyantena granthena vistaraśa upapāditam (tattvasaṃ. pañci. 144)
T16n1289u_001:2070: sarveṣāmeva ghaṭādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ sattvena kṣaṇikatve sādhye sādhyaviparyaye sthiratve yad bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ kramayaugapadyanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ tena vipakṣe parābhimate vyomādau vastutvāvastutvābhyaṃ vikalpyamāne sati vyāptiravadhāryata ityarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2071: ayamāśayaḥ--sarvaṣāmeva bhāvānāṃ kṣaṇikatve sādhye sapakṣāsaṃbhavena yanna kṣaṇikaṃ tanna sat yathā parābhimataṃ vyomādīti vyatirekavyāptiravadhāryā
T16n1289u_001:2072: nanu satā kṣaṇikena bhāvyamiti ko'yaṃ niyamaḥ ? |
T16n1289u_001:2073: ghaṭādayaḥ santo'pyakṣaṇikā eva kiṃ na syuriti tu nāśaṅkanīyam |
T16n1289u_001:2080: nanu vyomādisthirabhāvamanaṅgīkurvatāṃ mate vyomādervipakṣasyāprasiddhervipakṣe dharmiṇīti kathamucyate |
T16n1289u_001:2082: atāpi nāsaṅgatiḥ na hyatra vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntenāvaśyaṃ vastubhūtena bhāvyam |
T16n1289u_001:2087: pratyakṣaṃ cānupalambhaśca tayoḥ samāhāraḥ pratyakṣānupalambhaṃ tena |
T16n1289u_001:2101: yadā na vahnistadā na dhūma' iti kālata upalambhānupalambhābhyāṃ traividhyamuktam |
T16n1289u_001:2102: atha 'yatra dhūmastatra vahniryatra na vahnistatra na dhūmaḥ' iti deśata upalambhānupalambhābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ militāste trayaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvāvadhāraṇe kāraṇamiti bhavati kāraṇapañcakamityabhipretyāha--pañcavidhapratyakṣamupalambhato veti |
T16n1289u_001:2107: sādhyasya sapakṣeṃiścayāt vipakṣe sādhanābhāvasya sato'pi sādhyābhāvaprayuktatvāniścayāt jīvaccharīre sātmakatvasādhanāya paraiḥ prayujyamānaḥ saprāṇatvaheturasādhāraṇa iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2114: yadanekagataṃ tadanekam anekavṛtti ca sāmānyam yat sat tat kṣaṇikam sacca vyometi vadadbhirasmābhiḥ sāmānyaṃ vyoma vā'bhyupagamya tatra darmaviśeṣasya sādhanāya neha vyāptiḥ pramāṇīkriyate,
T16n1289u_001:2115: tayoranabhyupagamāditi cet kimartho'yaṃ vyāpyavyāpakabhāvopanyāsa iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2118: tasmāt anekagataṃ sāmānyamiṣyatā sāmānyamanekameveṣṭavyam ekaṃtaditi vadatā'nekagatamityetadvā parityājyam,
T16n1289u_001:2119: iti paraṃ pratyaniṣṭe āpādayitavye'nekagatatvānekatvayorvyāpyavyāpakabhāve aniṣṭāpādakāṃśe'nekānugataikasāmānyavādinaṃ prati pradarśite ekatvaṃ vā parityājyaṃ,
T16n1289u_001:2121: yathā katipayavahnidhūmavyaktīnāṃ katipayasthāneṣu yathā mahānasa ityekāṃśabodhane sakalavahnidhūmayoravinābhāva upapādyaḥ smārito bhavati tatheti
T16n1289u_001:2123: vādineti | vijigīṣukathāyāṃ vādinā svapakṣasthāpanāya prayogaḥ kartavyaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:2126: tadavabodhanāyāyamupakrama iti hetvābhāsanirūpaṇe saṅgatiḥ pradarśitā bhavati |
T16n1289u_001:2130: siddhasya sādhane siddhasādhanaṃ nāma nigrahasthānāntaramiti pare |
T16n1289u_001:2134: sādhyaṃcenniścitaṃ sandigdhasādhyakatvābhāvena pakṣasattvasya rūpasyāsaṃbhavāt hetulakṣaṇaṃ nāstītyasiddhāveva samāveśānna nigrahasthānāntaramiti
T16n1289u_001:2137: samarthe vastuni sāmarthyaṃ nāma na vastusvarūpādbhinnaḥ kaścana dharmaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:2139: tasminnasati vastveva netyuktaṃ bhavatīti hetorasāmarthye'vastutvameva tasyeti svarūpāsiddhāveva tasyāntarbhāva iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2146: pakṣatayo'bhimatatasyā''tmana evāsiddhau taddharmatayā'bhimatasya hetoḥ kva siddhiriti kaimutikanyāyenāsiddhirityuktaṃ bhavati |
T16n1289u_001:2156: tasmādahamarthena tadanuguṇena dharmiṇā śarīreṇaiva bhāvyamiti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2160: āha ca kamalaśīlaḥ--'yadyayaṃ gauṇaḥ syāt tadā skhaladvṛttirbhavet |
T16n1289u_001:2161: nahi loke siṃhamāṇavakayormukhyāropitayordvayorapi siṃha ityaskhalitā buddhirbhavati |
T16n1289u_001:2162: madīyāḥ śarīrādaya iti vyatirekadarśanāt skhaladvṛttirahaṃkāraḥ śarīrādiriti cenna |
T16n1289u_001:2164: tatrāpi hi madīya ātmeti vyatireko dṛśyate |
T16n1289u_001:2172: asati ca tasminnedaṃ ityanvayavyatirekasacāradarśane hi tasyedaṃ kāryamiti vijñāyeta |
T16n1289u_001:2174: ātmana evāsiddheḥ kaḥ svabhāvaliṅgasya prasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2176: jīvaccharīraṃ sātmakaṃ prāṇādimattvāditi yadanumānaṃ pradarśitaṃ tatra sādhyasyātmano'siddhatayā na tena hetorvyāptirniścīyeteti na tadanumānamātmasādhanāya prabhavatīti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2178: asmadabhyupagatā kṣaṇikavijñānadhīreva bhavatā''tmeti śabdāntareṇa vyavahriyata iti nātra no vipratipattiriti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2180: sopādhikatvena vyāpyatvāsiddhiriti pararasiddhāvantarbhāvyamānā yā vyāpyatvāsiddhiḥ sā kuto nokteti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2186: tāsāṃ ca tattadvyaktīnāṃ deśakālabhedena paricchedena paricchinnatayā tattadvayaktīnāmeva sāhacaryagrahāt sāmānyānavalambhinī vyāptirnaiva siddhayet
T16n1289u_001:2189: upādhiparijñānapūrvakaṃ vā'nyathā vā sādhane sādhyavyāptyuparodhagrahe syādevānaikāntikateti vyabhicāronnāyakatāmātreṇa na doṣāntarateti bhāvaḥ
T16n1289u_001:2190: nanu sāmānyamanabhupagacchatāṃ sāmānyamukhenaiva vyāptigraha ityetat kathaṃ syāditi śaṅkate--nānvatyādinā |
T16n1289u_001:2193: anekānugataṃ tvabhyupagamyate tvayā'pītyāśaṅkāṃ pariharannāha--nanu ko'yamapoho nāmetyādinā |
T16n1289u_001:2204: anyasmāt mahiṣāderanyad vijātīyaṃ śābaleyādi apohyate vyāvartyate iti seyaṃ vyāvṛttirapohaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2218: śābaleyabāhuleyādīn viśeṣān paśyataḥ svalakṣaṇairata eva mitho bhinnairapi tairyathāpratibhāsamarthapratibhāsātmā buddhāvākāra udbhavati |
T16n1289u_001:2242: na tu nivṛttaḥ sa hi paryudāsa iti yāvat |
T16n1289u_001:2244: prasajyapratiṣedharūpāpohapakṣe gauriti pratītau kevalo vidhiḥ svalakṣaṇātmā viṣayo bhavatītyāgataṃ na tvapoha ityāśayenāśaṅkate--nanvityādinā
T16n1289u_001:2256: nanu śābde vyavahāre gaurityeva śabda uccāryate,
T16n1289u_001:2264: gāṃ paśyan puruṣaḥ sapadi nāyamaśva iti prasajyapratiṣedhalakṣaṇamabhāvaṃ gṛhṇātyeva,
T16n1289u_001:2268: ataeva bhavati gāṃ purataḥ sthitāṃ paśyataḥ sapadi nāyamaśva ityadhyavasāya iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2272: anyat sarvameva jñānamanumānaṃ vā śābdaṃ vā bhavati vakalpātmakameva |
T16n1289u_001:2277: tasmāt gāmānayeti śabdaṃ śṛṇvataḥ puruṣasya sapadi bhavatyapoḍhādhyavasāyaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:2279: ataḥ śabdānāmapoḍhe saṅketa iti susthitamiti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2300: ya eva hi śabde jñāne pratibhāsate sa eva śabdārtho yuktaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:2304: tena tadevārthapratibimbakaṃ śābde jñāne sākṣāt tadātmatayā pratibhāsanācchābdo'rtho yukto nānya iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2305: yaścāpi śabdasyārthena saha vācyavācakabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ prasiddho nāsau kāryakāraṇabhāvādanyo'tratiṣṭhate;
T16n1289u_001:2307: tat adhyavasitabahirbhāvalakṣaṇaṃ rūpaṃ svabhāvo yasya tattathoktam,
T16n1289u_001:2308: tadrūpaṃ ca tat pratibimbaṃ ceti samāsaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2309: tasya tadrūpapratibambasya dhiyaḥ saṃbandhinaḥ śabdāt janmanyutpāde sati sa vācyavācakalakṣaṇo nirūpyamāṇaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvātmaka eva jātaḥ
T16n1289u_001:2314: idaṃ ca śabdaprāmāṇyamanabhyupagacchataḥ svasamayaniṣṭhān prati pratipādyate |
T16n1289u_001:2316: tadā tasminnarthe śabdasya prāmāṇyāpātena śabdapramāṇato'vagatasyārthasya sattvaviniścayāt ' ayaṃ gaurastī' ti astipadaprayogo vyarthaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:2319: śabdaśravaṇasamantaraṃ yathāsaṅketaṃ samupajātāduktalakṣaṇādhyavasāyādbhavati bāhyārthāvabodhaḥ tasya sattā tu nāvagamyate,
T16n1289u_001:2329: tathā ca svalakṣāṇasya tadarthasya sattā tenaivāvadhṛteti na tadavabodhanāya astītipadāpekṣeti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2332: yā vyaktiryenendriyeṇa gṛhyate tanniṣṭhā jātirapi tenaivendriyeṇa gṛhyata ityeṣa pareṣāṃ svagoṣṭhīniṣṭhaḥ samayaḥ kevalam,
T16n1289u_001:2334: tat sāmānye na pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2336: athāpi gamekāṃ purataḥ paśyato'nubhūtānekagovyakteḥ puṃso bhavati kaścidekākāraparāmarśalakṣaṇaḥ pratyayaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:2338: anyathā tadanupapattestadeva ca sāmānyamityāśayena pareṇa kriyamānāmāśaṅkāmanūdya nirasyati--naceti |
T16n1289u_001:2340: gavādivyaktayaḥ svahetubhyo jāyamānāṃ śaktiviśeṣaviśiṣṭā eva jāyante,
T16n1289u_001:2341: yayā mitho bhinnā api gośabdābhilapyāḥ kāścideva vyaktayo gaurityekākāraparāmarśe hetavo bhavanti,
T16n1289u_001:2346: indriyatvāviśeṣe'pi kāsāñcideva vyaktīnāṃ rupagrahaṇasāmarthyaṃ kāsāñcideva rasagranaḥasāmarthyamiti yathā niyataṃ tathetyarthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2350: tāsāmeṣa svabhāvaviśeṣo yadekākārapratyavamarśahetutvamiti svabhāvāśrayaṇetottaraṃ pramāṇikavastvapalāpāyaivetyāśaṅkāṃ parihannāha-- kiñceti
T16n1289u_001:2351: ayamāśayaḥ--dravyādibhyo vyāvṛttaṃ bhinnaṃ sāmānyamatiriktaḥ padārthaṃ iti vadatāṃ mate jātivyaktyoratyantabhedo bhavatyabhimataḥ,
T16n1289u_001:2353: evaṃ bhedāviśeṣe'pi gotvaṃ govyaktiṣveva samavaiti nānyatra,
T16n1289u_001:2354: aśvatvamaśvavyaktiṣveva samavaiti nānyatretyatra kiṃ niyāmakamiti śaṅkāyāṃ svabhāva evaiṣa gotvādīnāṃ,
T16n1289u_001:2357: asmābhiḥ pratipādyamānaṃ svabhāvāśraṇenottaraṃ prāmāṇikaṃ paraiḥ pratipādyamānaṃ tvaprāmāṇikamityeṣa viśeṣa iti |
T16n1289u_001:2362: viśeṣyāt bhinnaṃ yadviśeṣaṇam--viśiṣṭabuddhau viśeṣyatayā bhāsamānasya yadviśeṣaṇatayā bhāsate viśeṣyato bhinnaṃ,
T16n1289u_001:2366: gauriti yadvastupratyakṣaṃ tat piṇḍaṃ tato bhinnaṃ gotvaṃ sāmānyaṃ cobhayamavabhāsayatītyetat sarvānubhavaviruddham,
T16n1289u_001:2367: puraḥsthitaṃ paśyato hi sphurati vastumātramiti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2374: gotve sāmānyatvamiti ca na gotvato bhinnaṃ,
T16n1289u_001:2378: ayaṃ gauriti pratyakṣe vastuto vastumātragrāhiṇyapi svarūpavān ghaṭa ityatra kalpitabhedamādāya viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāvopapattivat piṇḍādananyatve'pi gotvasya kalpitabhedamādāya viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇabhāvopapattyā arthāntaraprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2381: evaṃ sāmānyasādhakatayā parābhimataṃ prayogaṃ nirasya sāmānyanirāsakaṃ prayogaṃ pradarśayati--sāmānyasya niṣedhāyetyādinā--yadyatropalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sannopalabhyate iti |
T16n1289u_001:2385: satyapīndriyasaṃprayogādāvupalambhakasamavāye upalabhyamāne ca vyaktiviśeṣe tatra gotvaṃ vipratipannaṃ naivopalabhyate,
T16n1289u_001:2387: na tato'nyā gotvajātirupalabhyate iti nāsiddho heturiti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2388: nanu darśanāgocarasyāpi jñānasyeva cākṣuṣopalambhāgocarasyāpi sāmānyasya nāsadbhāva ityāśaṅkāmanūdya pariharati--nāpītyādinā |
T16n1289u_001:2392: sa ca prāsaṅgiko vicāraḥ 'tasmāt sarvaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ vastu paraparikalpitasāmānyena śūnya' miti samupasaṃhṛtaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2393: yathā saṃskṛtaṃ sarvaṃ vastu niḥsāmānyakaṃ tathā na kenāpyuparacitamiti prasaktamanuprasaktametat |
T16n1289u_001:2394: nanu śākhācaṅkramaṇaṃ yat saṃskṛtavastunirdeśamanupravṛttirasmin vicāra iti |
T16n1289u_001:2396: ' yadi nityaḥ kartā jagato na kāraṇaṃ kimasya tarhi kāraṇam,
T16n1289u_001:2397: sattvānāṃ śubhāśubhākhyaṃ karma' ityādinā pramāṇanirūpaṇāt prameyanirūpaṇe'vatarato dvārametat |
T16n1289u_001:2398: etena pūrvameveśvaro jagataḥ kartā nirasta iti punaruktametaditi śaṅkā parihṛtā,
T16n1289u_001:2400: tatreśvarasādhakatayā paropanyastasya prayogasya nirasanamiha tu tasya sargādikartṛtvānupapattiriti nirasanaprakārabhedaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2406: tadā tvayaṃ doṣa ityāha--nityeṃ kartari samarthe satīti |
T16n1289u_001:2414: kāryamātraṃ prati tasya kāraṇatvena sahakāriṇo janayanneṣa nityaḥ samarthaḥ kuto yugapanna janayatītīyamāśaṅkā tatrāpi tulyaiveti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2417: satyāmicchāyāṃ kuryāt na cenna kuryāditi na sarvakāryayaugapadyaprasaṅga ityāśayena śaṅkate--buddhimatvādīśvarasyeti |
T16n1289u_001:2420: cetanaṃ kāraṇamabhyupagacchato'smān prati tu nāsyāḥ śaṅkāyā avasara iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2421: icchānāṃ vā kuto na yaugapadyamityāśayenāha -- tā apīti |
T16n1289u_001:2424: śaktasyāsyāsya śaktiviśeṣarūpāstāḥ ayaṃ ca nityaḥ samarthaśca sarvakāryorpādane,
T16n1289u_001:2425: athāpi tāḥ sahakārilakṣaṇāḥ śaktayastvāgantukyaḥ ataḥ sargādīnāṃ na yaugapadyaprasaṅgaṃ iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2429: athāpi te sahakāriṇaḥ kādācitkā ityatat vyāhataṃ vaca ityāśayenāha--tarhi mātā'pi satīti |
T16n1289u_001:2431: kāryasya svabhāvaviśeṣamavalambhya pratyavatiṣṭhate--nanveṣa eva kāryasya svabhāva iti |
T16n1289u_001:2434: yadi na sādhayedasamrtha eva sa iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2436: sraṣṭā'yaṃ kramāt bhāvān sṛjatīti hi bhavān manyate |
T16n1289u_001:2442: sadṛśātmanaḥ--samarthasya nityasya svarūpaṃ hi na viparivartate jātu,
T16n1289u_001:2446: yadidaṃ kramāt kāryādhānaṃ dṛśyate tat sthira tayā'bhimate kasmiṃścadapi na ghaṭata iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2453: pratyakṣeṇākṣaṇikataiva hi gamyata ityāśaṅkate--nacātra pratyakṣavirodha iti |
T16n1289u_001:2460: yadā svayamudbhavati tadā vartamānaṃ vastumātraṃ gṛhṇāti,
T16n1289u_001:2462: svayaṃ ca kṣaṇāntare vinaśyan anekakṣaṇayogamekasya gṛhītuṃ na kalpante iti |
T16n1289u_001:2463: pūrvāparakṣaṇayośca na vartamāne sākṣātkārakāle prakāśo ghaṭeta,
T16n1289u_001:2465: yadi punaḥ pratyakṣakāle pūrvāparakṣaṇayogasyāpi prakāśa iṣyeta,
T16n1289u_001:2466: tarhi sākṣātkriyamāṇasya vastunastadaivājanmata āvināśamanuvartamānaḥ kālānvayo'pi prakāśeta,
T16n1289u_001:2467: tathāsatyutpannasya vastuno vināśāvadhirapi bhavatāṃ mate vijñāta eva bhavedityāśayenāha--janmavināśāvadhīti |
T16n1289u_001:2484: tadetat kumāriloktaṃ pratikṣipati--smaraṇagrahaṇarūpaṃ tarhi pratyabhijñānaṃ syāditi |
T16n1289u_001:2496: ataḥ purasthitavastugrahaṇarūpaiveyaṃ pratyabhijñetyāśayena parasya pratyavasthānamanūdya nirasyati -- yena hītyādinā |
T16n1289u_001:2498: ekaṃ vastu rūpe ca bhinne dve iti vadannunmatta eva syāt,
T16n1289u_001:2528: ayamāśayaḥ -- nanu viruddho'yaṃ hetuḥ--pratyabhijñā hi deśāre kālātare vā'nubhūtasya taddeśakālayogaṃ tadevedaṃ nīlamiti gamayati,
T16n1289u_001:2535: tat pratyabhijñānasyaikālambanatvaṃ naivopapadyate iti na viruddhatvamanaikāntikatā veti |
T16n1289u_001:2538: tasyaikālambanatvaṃ kiṃ yuktaṃ na vetyetadevādya vicāryata iti pratyabhijñānato vastvaikyopapādanamanupapannamipyāha--naca pratyabhijñānameveti
T16n1289u_001:2543: bhājana lokaḥ--sattvānāṃ prāṇināṃ bhājanabhūtaḥ-- āśrayabhūto loko bhājanalokaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:2545: cittamevabāhyātmanā bhāsata iti cittavilāsa eva sarmaviti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2547: karma cittamavadhūya na cānyat--dvividhaṃ satyaṃ--pāramārthikasatyaṃ sāṃvṛtika satyaṃ ceti |
T16n1289u_001:2548: tatra pāramārthikadṛṣtayā tu cittameva sarvasya mūlam sāṃvṛtidṛṣṭayā tu aśeṣaṃ jagat sattvānāṃ karmaṇā jātam |
T16n1289u_001:2549: tadevaṃ karma cittaṃ cetyubhayaṃ vinā jagato na kiñcinmūlamiti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2551: vaibhāṣikādyavāntarabhedo hi bhagavataḥ paścāttanaḥ yadvacanamāśritya vaibhāṣikāḥ pravartante iti yāvat |
T16n1289u_001:2554: asti pramāṇamanumānamityabhiprāyeṇāha--ucyate iti catvāryāsatyāni teṣāṃ sākṣātkāro yasya bhavati sa sarvajñaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:2555: sākṣātkāraśca sphuṭāvabhāsa ityabhiprāyeṇa teṣāṃ sphuṭāvabhāse prayogaṃ darśayati--yo ya ityādinā |
T16n1289u_001:2562: svabhāvahetunā'nena caturṇāmāryasatyānāṃ sphuṭībhāvayogyatve siddhe sphuṭāvabāṣāsaṃbhavanirasanamukhena sarvajñāsiddhirnirastā bhavati |
T16n1289u_001:2564: sarvajñe pramāṇaṃ neti vadato'yamāśayaḥ--na tasmin pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam,
T16n1289u_001:2572: prajñāprakarṣe'pi nendriyārthayoḥ svabhāvaṃ samatilaṅghya kiñcit jñātuṃ śaknoti | uktaṃ ca --
T16n1289u_001:2575: prājño'pi hi naraḥ sūkṣmānarthān draṣṭuṃ kṣamo'pi san |
T16n1289u_001:2581: so'pi vicāryamāṇoṃavaratānudhyānalakṣaṇaḥ avicchinnasmṛtidhārārūpaḥ svayaṃ na sākṣātkārātmā,
T16n1289u_001:2586: tat sarvajñe pratyakṣādipramāṇānupalambhamātreṇa kathaṃ tatpratiṣedhaḥ kartuṃ śakyeta,
T16n1289u_001:2588: yāvadbādhakaṃ nopalabhyate tāvat tatra saṃśayastu syādeva,
T16n1289u_001:2589: evaṃ sati kathaṃ bhavān sugatasārvajñyaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ prabhavati |
T16n1289u_001:2590: nanu bādhakaṃ pradarśitam--'sarvajñatā ca na ghaṭate' ityādinā |
T16n1289u_001:2593: na śrotrādi śrotraṃ śabdameva gṛhṇīyānna rūpam,
T16n1289u_001:2599: nanu mano nāmāntaramindriyaṃ bāhyendriya dvāreṇaivārthe pravartetetyanullaṅghanīyo niyamaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2608: yathā yathā nairātmyabhāvanayā'pacīyante rāgādayo malāstathā tathā caturāryabhavanayā ca prakarṣaṃ gatayā pravardhate prajñā,
T16n1289u_001:2614: sādaranirantarābhyāsāt prajñāprakarṣo bhatītyatra tu bhavatyayaṃ prayogaḥ--'yo yaḥ sādare' tyādi riti |
T16n1289u_001:2619: so'yaṃ kāmicittaguṇabhūto yuvatyākāraḥ sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsasahitaḥ sphuṭībhāvayogyo bhavati (sphuṭāvabhāso bhavati)
T16n1289u_001:2620: tathā vivekinaścittaṃ vibhāvyamānacaturāryasatyākāraṃ bhavatīti so'yaṃ caturāryasatyākāraścetoguṇabhūtaḥ sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsasahitaḥ sphuṭāvabhāsayogyo bhavati,
T16n1289u_001:2624: rūpaskandho vedanāskandhaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandho vijñānaskandha iti tadetat skandhapañcakaṃ duḥkha mucyate |
T16n1289u_001:2627: nirodhasyāsya yat dvāraṃ sa mārga ucyate |
T16n1289u_001:2630: te hi saṅkalpapathamārūḍhā duḥkhādyāryacatuṣṭayākārāḥ pratyātmaṃ cetastale prakāśanta eveti nāśrayāsiddhiḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2633: cittasyālambanākāratayā ālambanamātraṃ cittākāra eveti te cetoguṇāḥ pratyātmaṃ prakāśanta eveti na hetvasiddhiḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2634: dharmiṇi ca sādara nirantaradīrghakālābhyāsaviśiṣṭacetoguṇatāyāḥ saṃbhavena pakṣadharmatā na nopapadyate |
T16n1289u_001:2637: kāminyā yuvatyā ākāre kāminā'nudhyāyamāne iti vā |
T16n1289u_001:2640: sādaranirantaradīrghakālābhyāsaviśiṣṭā ye ye cetoguṇā yuvatyākārādayaste sarve'pi sphūṭāvabhāsayogyā eva na tu sarva te sphuṭāvabhāsāyogyāḥ
T16n1289u_001:2641: nanu sādaranirantaradīrdhakālābhyāsaviśiṣṭeṣu katipayacetoguṇeṣu sphuṭāvabhāsayoghyatvadarśane'pi sarveṣāṃ tathātve ko niyamaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:2650: itthaṃ ca sarvopasaṃhāreṇa pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ siddhyantīti kāryakāraṇabhāvalakṣaṇāt pratibandhādhvayāptisiddhiriti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2659: idamatrāvedyate--yathā paścādabhyāsasaṃvedanaṃ sphuṭābhasaṃvedanaṃ ceti pratyakṣadvayam tathā pūrvamabhyāsaviśiṣṭacetoguṇānupalambhaḥ sphuṭāvabhāsānupalambhaścetyanupalambhadvayaṃ kiṃ na syāt,
T16n1289u_001:2660: vastutastu svetarayāvatkāraṇfsamavadhāne satyapi yasminna sati kāryānupalambha ityeko'nupalambhaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:2661: sati tu yasmin kāryopalambha iti pratyakṣamekam,
T16n1289u_001:2662: itthaṃ ca pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvāvadhāraṇamiti tu yuktam |
T16n1289u_001:2663: evaṃ sthite kāraṇopalambhaṃ kāryopalambhaṃ ca pṛthak gaṇayitvā pratyakṣadvayaṃ cet saṃpādyeta kāraṇānupalambhaṃ kāryānupalambhaṃ ca pṛthaggaṇayitvā'nupalambhadvayāśrayaṇena cāturvidhyaṃ kiṃ na syāt |
T16n1289u_001:2664: anayaivāśaṅkayā pūrvaṃ 'kāryahetordhūmādervahnyādinā mahānasādau dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi trividhapratyakṣānupalambhena pañcavidhapratyakṣānupalambhato ve' tyetadvākyaṃ prakārāntareṇonnītam |
T16n1289u_001:2665: nibandhakārasya tu hārdamiha paśyatāṃ naḥ pūrvavyākhyānaṃ nibandhakarturhārdaṃ nānusaratīti |
T16n1289u_001:2667: caturāryasākṣātkāritvasiddhāvapi na sarvasākṣātkaritvaṃ saṃbhavati atha kathaṃ sarvajñatāsiddhiriti śaṅkiturāśayaḥ yadyapi catuṣvāryasatyeṣvanangargato naiko'pi bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2672: kāryakāraṇabhāvāpannaṃ yadbījāṅkurādi yacca citta caittaṃ sa dharma iti paribhāṣyate |
T16n1289u_001:2681: tathāvidhajñānapūrvakatvaṃ svayamananubhūya sākṣātkarturvacane prāmāṇyamanu prayujyamāne paramparayā,
T16n1289u_001:2682: tathā sugatānuyāyināṃ 'kṣāṇikaḥ sarva eva saṃskārā' ityasmin vacane ca |
T16n1289u_001:2687: kṣāṇabhaṅgo hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ tadarthāvabodhakatayā cāsya vākyasya pramāṇasaṃvādiniścitārthāvabodhatvarūpahetornāsiddhiriti bhāvaḥ
T16n1289u_001:2688: pramāṇaniścitārthakatvasya hetuviśeṣaṇasya prayojanaṃ prakāśayannanaikāntikatāṃ vārayati--vacanamātrasya saṃśayapiparyāsapūrvakatve'pīti |
T16n1289u_001:2695: asati kāraṇe kāryānupalambha iti pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇavyorvyāptirnirābādhā gṛhyata eveti bhāvaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:2700: pramāṇānāṃ nivṛttyā tu prameyaṃ na nivartate |
T16n1289u_001:2702: sā pramāṇanivṛttiśca kvacid dṛṣṭā na sādhanam |
T16n1289u_001:2705: ye nāma bodhisattvāḥ syuḥ prakṛtyaiva kṛpāmayāḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2713: kiṃ śabdaḥ pratikṣepe--pramāṇa nāstītyarthaḥ lokāyata tānuyāyinaḥ seyamāśaṅkā |
T16n1289u_001:2715: ayamabhiprāyaḥ--astu nāma ye sthiramātmānamabhyupacchanti teṣāṃ kathamapi punarbhavapratyāśā |
T16n1289u_001:2716: sarvasya kṣaṇikatāṃ vadataḥ kathaṃ punarbhavakathā ghaṭeteti |
