T16n1289u_001:2718: kṣaṇabhaṅgavādibhirasmābhirapyahaṃpratyayāspadabhūtā vijñānadhārā pratisattvaṃ bhinnā'nuvartata eva bhave bhava ityabhyupagataṃ nāma,
T16n1289u_001:2721: atrāyaṃ prayoto bhavatītyāśayenāha--yaccittaṃ taccittāntaraṃ pratisandhatte iti |
T16n1289u_001:2728: arhatāmapagatarāgādīnāṃ caramaṃ cittaṃ cittāntaraṃ notpādayatīti saugaterapīṣyata iti tasmiṃścitte vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2733: ayamāśayaḥ--na saugatānāṃ sarveṣāmabhimatametat arhato bhavati caramaṃ cittaṃ,
T16n1289u_001:2736: vastutasteṣāmapi vītarāgāṇāṃ vyapetasakalāvidyāmūlāṇāṃ kleśādimalairanāliptā vimalā cittasantatiranuvartata eveti nānaikāntikapralaṅga iti |
T16n1289u_001:2746: kamalaśīlena cetthaṃ vyākhyātam--'kutaḥ prasiddhamarhatāṃ na cittāntaraṃ pratisandhatte maraṇacittamiti,
T16n1289u_001:2747: athā'pi syāt parakīye bauddhasiddhānte paṭhyate kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparamasmāt bhavaṃ prajānāmīti,
T16n1289u_001:2752: x x x x parasiddhāntāśrayaṇenāpi kāṃścid bauddhān prati sādhyadharmasamanvito na siddho dṛṣṭānta iti darśayannāha--yeceha sudhiya itī'ti (tattvasaṃ. pañci. 538-539)
T16n1289u_001:2755: arhanmaraṇacittaṃ tu na tathāvidhamiti nānaikāntikateti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2762: maraṇakālabhāvicittasya cittāntarotpādatvaṃ prasādhya janmakālabhāvinaścittasya svodayahetubhūtacittapūrvakatvaṃ prasādhayannāha--ihetyādinā pūrvottarabhavadvayasamarthanena anekabhavānvayo dṛḍhīkṛto bhavati |
T16n1289u_001:2766: sarvajñāśca bahavo buddhāḥ ityādibhedavarṇanaṃ kathaṃ ghaṭate,
T16n1289u_001:2768: śūnyatādṛṣṭireva tu muktiriti ca tāttvikī sthitirityāśayena śaṅkate--nanuceti |
T16n1289u_001:2771: sarvaṃ evāvidyāvaśāt sthiravividhabhāvavāsanākaluṣitacetasaḥ sapadi śreyaḥpathe nāvatārayituṃ śakyante,
T16n1289u_001:2773: ayamāśayaḥ--avidyayā''veṣṭitān dṛṣtamātreṣu avicārya tattattvamidamidamiti dhāvato'narthaṃ nipatato lokān śūnyatādṛṣṭau sapadyāvatārayitumaśakyatayā yadidaṃdṛśyate tadetat skandhāyatanādi,
T16n1289u_001:2774: sarvaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ na sthiramekamiti kṣaṇikatvopadeśaḥ prathamataḥ pravṛtto bhagavanaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:2776: tato vijñānādvaitatadṛṣṭeravatārya śūnyatādṛṣṭau naiḥśreyasaikāntāyāṃ lokānvartayituṃ sarvaṃ śūnyamiti sarvaṃśūnyatopadeśaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2777: tadevaṃ sāṃvṛtāsāṃvṛtabhedamāśritya kṣaṇikaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ śūnyamiticopadeśabhedaḥ pravṛtta iti |
T16n1289u_001:2778: tathācoktam--lokāvataraṇārthaṃ ca bhāvā nāthena deśitāḥ | iti |
T16n1289u_001:2779: vineyajanāvataraṇāya pravṛttamupadeśabhedamavalabhya saugateṣu matabhedaḥ pravṛttaḥ sa ca vaibhāṣikādibhedādbhinnaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2795: nīlādayo bāhyārthaḥ svākāraṃ buddhau samarpya svayaṃ najyanti,
T16n1289u_001:2800: tarhi prakāśasvabhāvatayā tadapi cittavadābhyantarameveti kathaṃ tad bāhyamucyate |
T16n1289u_001:2802: cakṣuḥpathe yannipatitaṃ tasya ca cittasya ca kaḥ saṃbandhaḥ yaccittena gṛhyeta,
T16n1289u_001:2806: na cet saṃvedyate--yadā ca na saṃvedyate,
T16n1289u_001:2810: yadi bāhyo'rthaḥ pratyakṣapramāṇena na gṛhyate tarhi tasmin pramāṇābhāvād vijñānamātrameva vastvitīṣyatām,
T16n1289u_001:2816: etat -- uttarottaracitte pūrvapūrvacittato nirantaramanuvartamāne'pi kvacideva deśe kvacideva samaye nīlāvabhāso nānyadā nānyatretyetat |
T16n1289u_001:2821: atha yogācāramataṃ vijñānamātrāstitvapakṣaṃ nirūpayan bāhyastitvavādaṃ vikalpya dūṣayati--kaḥ punarasāṃ bāhyo'rthaṃ iti |
T16n1289u_001:2824: kiṃ vā navavidhaṃ dravyaṃ kiṃ vā paramāṇava iti vikalpārthaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2825: yadyapyavayavyādivibhāgo vaibhāṣikasautrāntikāmyāṃ nādriyate athāpi vijñānamātrastitvavādanā bāhyārthamātrasya nirasanīyatayā teṣāmapyupādānam
T16n1289u_001:2826: ante paramāṇūnāṃ niveśaḥ avayavinirasanapūrvakaṃ paramāṇumātrābhyupagamaṃ vaibhāṣikasautrāntikayorviśeṣamabhipretya |
T16n1289u_001:2830: ādiśabdāt kriyādeḥ parigrahaḥ dravaniṣedhanava teṣāṃ niṣiddhatvāditi |
T16n1289u_001:2831: kathaṃ dravyaniṣedhenaiva tanniṣedhaḥ āha--na cāsati samavāyini dravye iti |
T16n1289u_001:2832: ataeva satyāpi dūṣaṇāntare tannādṛtamatrāsmābhirityāha--dūṣaṇamapi nādrīyata iti |
T16n1289u_001:2843: anenāhaṃgrahahetubhūtasyāhamarthasya kādācitkatvasiddhyā ātmā nityo'stītyetannirastaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2850: saudāminī kṣaṇamāvirbhūya tiṃrobhavati tāmanu tadjñānamapīti pratyakṣam |
T16n1289u_001:2851: saudāminyāḥ prāk paścācca na tajjñānopalambha ityanupalambhaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2857: nanu akādacitkādapi syāt kādācitkādapīti cet tarhi aniyatakāraṇatāpatteṃrahetukataivāpataditi bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2859: saudāminyāṃ tadjñāne ca pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ sādhyahetvoḥ sāhacaryaniyame satyapyanyatrānaikāntikataivetyāśayaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2862: anyatra vinaiva vahniṃ dhūmaḥ kiṃ na svādityanaikāntikatāśaṅkā tatrāpi prasajediti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2867: kāraṇasya kuvadrapatvāt--kāryaniṣpādanasāmarthyena kāraṇaṃ kāryarupaṃ kurvadeva syāt,
T16n1289u_001:2872: tayorbhedaniyamāt abhede tu svabhāvaikyena kurvato'pyakurvato'pi syādeva kāryotpattiritiṃ bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2874: akādācitkasyaivātmanaḥ kādācitkāhaṃgrahotpādakatve ekena tena kramādyāvanto'haṃgrahā utpādyante te sarve yugapadutpadyeran |
T16n1289u_001:2884: vastu vā tadavastu veti vicārayanto vayamavastveveti brūmaḥ--vastunā hyarthakriyāsamarthena bhāvyam,
T16n1289u_001:2890: atha teṣu sapratigheṣvasatsu teṣāmabhāvādevāvakāśaḥ siddha iti kimākāśena,
T16n1289u_001:2897: nityamekaṃ vibhumākāśamicchatāṃ śabdasya tadāśrayatāṃ ca svīkurvatāṃ jāyamānasya sarvasya śabdasyākāśa eva deśa iti asya śabdasyāyaṃ deśaḥ tasya tu sa deśa iti deśavibhāgasya vaktumaśakyatayā deśavibhāgena śabdaśravaṇaṃ nopapadyeta,
T16n1289u_001:2898: yaḥ śrotrākāśa ucyate sa cākāśānnatiricyate iti nāyaṃ śrotrākāśasya saṃnihitaḥ śabdaḥ ayameva tu sannihita ityāśrayākāśe pradeśabhedakalpanasyānupapannatvāt sarva eva śabdāḥ śrūyeran,
T16n1289u_001:2900: tarhi tadanyaḥ sannihitoṃ ya ucyate so'pi na śrūyeta,
T16n1289u_001:2902: yadi śrūyeran sarvaṃ eva śrūyeran na cennaikopīti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2904: uktaṃ ca kamalaśīlena --'yadi hi nityaikanabhodravyasamavetā amī syuḥ,
T16n1289u_001:2905: tadā sakṛdutpannānekaśabdavat atatkālā api śabdā abhimatakāla eva syuḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2916: yā tu manaḥsādhane parairyuktirnirūpitā tāmanudya nirasyati--yugapadjñānānutpattyetyādinā |
T16n1289u_001:2917: ayamāśayaḥ -- yadi mano neṣyeta jñānāṃ cākṣuṣādīnāṃ yaugapadyamāpadyeta |
T16n1289u_001:2918: ātmano vibhoścakṣurādīndriyaiḥ saha sadaiva saṃbhavāt karatalasannihitasya kusumādeścakṣuḥspārśanādīndriyasaṃprayogasya yugapat saṃbhavāt |
T16n1289u_001:2919: manasi cendriye'bhyupagamyamāne'ṇostasya yugapadanekendriyasaṃyogasyāsaṃbhavād indriyamanaḥsaṃyogasyāpi pratyakṣe hetutayā na jñānānāṃ yaugapadyaprasaṅga iti vaiśeṣikā manyante |
T16n1289u_001:2921: nartakīṃ paśyanto hi tasyā rūpaṃ gānaṃ ca yugapadeva sākṣātkurvantaḥ kamapyahlādamanubhavanti,
T16n1289u_001:2923: lokānubhavasiddhasya jñānayaugapadyasya vyāvatireva syāttannāstyeva parābhimataṃ manaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:2929: kāraṇasya tu nityatve kārye kramikatā katham |
T16n1289u_001:2943: yadi syādupalabhyeta nopalabhyatetu paṭo nāma kaścittaṃttubhyonyaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:2946: atrāyaṃ prayogaḥ--yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sadyatra nopalabhyate na tattatrāsti,
T16n1289u_001:2961: bhāgā eva hi bhāsanta ityetat praśnaprativacanamukhena vyācaṣṭe nanu ko'yamityadinā |
T16n1289u_001:2964: nānādigdeśāvaṣṭambhena bahavaḥ paramāṇavaḥ ekasmin sthale pūrvapaścimadakṣiṇottarordhvādholakṣaṇanānādigdeśāvaṣṭambhena sthitāḥ puṃjībhūtā ucyante
T16n1289u_001:2984: avayavisamarthanāya pravṛttaṃ prati prativaktavye sayūthyānāṃ matenedamucyate iti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2986: atha bāhyārthānnirasyannāha--te'pi yogācārāṇāṃ mate na santīti |
T16n1289u_001:2992: ataeva puñjāvasthāyāṃ dṛśyamānānāṃ pratyekamavasthitau kuto'dṛśyateti śaṅkāyā nāvakāśaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:2998: atredaṃ vimṛśyate--samuditā eva jāyantāṃ samuditā eva naśyantu,
T16n1289u_001:3003: ucyate--yo hi paramāṇuḥ paramāṇumadhyamadhyāste sa caturṣu pārśveṣu adharottaraṃ ca paramāṇubhiḥ sasṛṣṭa iti digbhāgabhedena ṣaḍaṃśatāpattyā naikatāpattiranatilaṅghanīyaiva |
T16n1289u_001:3004: sa hi madhyagataḥ paramāṇuḥ pārśve paramāṇau yena svabhāvena saṃsṛjate,
T16n1289u_001:3006: yena svabhāvena ūrdhādhaḥparamaṇubhyāṃ saṃyujyate na tena pārśvaparamāṇau |
T16n1289u_001:3008: digbhedakṛtabhedasya durnirūpatayā ekadeśatāpatteḥ pracayo na siddhayet |
T16n1289u_001:3015: ato naika ityeva brūmaḥ na paramāṇurathāpyaneka iti tryāha tam |
T16n1289u_001:3016: kasmāt ?, paramāṇoḥ--paramāṇutayā'bhimatasyānaiḥ saha paramāṇubhiḥ paramāṇuśaḥ--atyantāṇuśaḥ sayogasyāsaṃbhavāt |
T16n1289u_001:3020: atha cenniraṃśaḥ saṃyujyate ityutyucyeta sarvataḥ saṃyogāt parasparamabhinnadeśatayā piṇḍaḥ paramāṇūmātra eva syāt |
T16n1289u_001:3043: daurghaṭyaṃ ca nirūpitamityāśayenāha -- yadi bāhyo'rtha ityādinā |
T16n1289u_001:3048: bhavati cātra prayoga ityāśayenāha -- na ca svāpnajāgradanubhavayorityādinā anālambanādanavāptarūpaviśeṣamiti |
T16n1289u_001:3051: cākṣuṣadoṣavaśāt dṛśyate nabhasi keśa iva bhraman,
T16n1289u_001:3060: nanu--asati bāhye'rthe kiṃ tarhi sat bhavataḥ,
T16n1289u_001:3075: saṃvṛttyaiva pravṛtto natu viṣayitayā vastutastena śūnyam |
T16n1289u_001:3078: vijānānamātravādiṣu kecana vijñānameva vāsanāvaicitryeṇa nīlapītādivividhākāraṃ bhūtvā bhāsate iti,
T16n1289u_001:3079: apare tu vastuto nirākārameva tu tat,
T16n1289u_001:3082: pakṣadvaye'pyasmin grāhyagrāhakabhāvarāhityaṃ vijñānasya saṃpratipannameveti vijñānasvabhāvaparyālocanayā bāhyārthagrāhakatā vijñānasyetyetaddarotsāritamityāha--tatra kecidityādinā |
T16n1289u_001:3084: na cāsya vicārataḥ kaścit svabhāvo ghaṭate eko vā'neko veti |
T16n1289u_001:3085: vijñānamātravādīnā paramāṇau bāhyatayā parairabhimate kimayamekasvabhāvaḥ--uta naikasvabhāvaḥ (ekarūpa uta naikarūpaḥ)
T16n1289u_001:3092: bhāvā yena nirūpyante iti bhāvāḥ--bāhyā ābhyantaraśca |
T16n1289u_001:3097: atha pramāṇameva yadā vicāryamāṇaṃ viśīryate tadadhīnasadgāvasya sarvaṃsyānyasya kva vastutā,
T16n1289u_001:3100: nanu ayaṃ baddho'yaṃ mukta iti vyavasthā'pi vyāhanyeta |
T16n1289u_001:3102: iyaṃ vyavasthā'pi saṃvṛttyaiva na paramārthata iti |
T16n1289u_001:3110: svabhāvarāhityādbhāvānāmapāramārthye prayogaṃ pradarśayati--prayogaḥ punarevamiti ekānekasvabhāvaṃ na bhavatīti |
T16n1289u_001:3116: hetoḥ pakṣe sattvamupapādayannasiddhiśaṅkāṃ vārayati--na tāvada siddho hetuṃriti |
T16n1289u_001:3117: sākāre vijñāne bahirartha eva ekānekasvabhāvāyogyatvasya parispuṭatvāditi |
T16n1289u_001:3118: nīlapītādāvaṇusamudāye bāhyārthatayā iṣyamāṇe aṇurayamekasvabhāvo vā naikasvabhāvo vā ubhayathā'pi nopapadyata iti yo doṣa udbhāvitaḥ,
T16n1289u_001:3120: nīlapītadyākāraṃ sadvabhāsate iti vadato'pi samāna eveti sphuṭameveti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:3122: idaṃ nīlamidaṃ pītamiti idantayā loke vyavahriyamāṇo nīlapītādiraṇusamudāyo bāhyo'rtha iti sarvāstitvavādinā iṣyate,
T16n1289u_001:3123: vijñānavādinā tu vijñānameva ttattadākāraṃ bahirvadavabhāsata iti vadatā vijñānākāratayā nīlapītādyabhyugataṃ bhavatīti nīlapitādi tu na sarvathā'pohyate,
T16n1289u_001:3125: tathāca bāhyatve ya ākṣepaḥ sa āntaratve'pi samāna eveti bhāvaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:3129: tathāca bāhyaṃ vā bhavatu āntaraṃ vā,
T16n1289u_001:3131: nanu bāhyaṃ nīlapītādyabhyupagacchatā mūrtaṃ taditi svīkṛtaṃ bhavati,
T16n1289u_001:3132: vijñānamātraṃ taditi vadatāṃ tu tadamūrtaṃ bhavatīti neyaṃ śaṅkā'mūte prasaredityāśaṅkā paraharannāha--mūrtanimittamityādinā |
T16n1289u_001:3134: sākāratve mūrtatā katha mityatrāha--ayameva hi cittānāmākāro mūrtiriti |
T16n1289u_001:3136: nirākārajñānamātrapāramārthyavāde tu prakārāntareṇa bhāvamātrasādhāraṇo doṣo vistaraśo nirūpito'nyatra--
T16n1289u_001:3137: 'na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ nāpyahetutaḥ |
T16n1289u_001:3138: utpannā jātu vidyante bhāvāḥ kvacana kecana |
